lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to tonight's episode of Critical Role, where a bunch of us nerdy-ass voice actors sit around and play Dungeons & Dragons. For our 99th episode, which is crazy, that's absolute batshit. Makes next week the 100th, which is crazy, even more crazy, and we'll be more crazy.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You did the math wrong there. Oh no, that's right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tonight Jon Heder will be joining us-- (cheering)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Who is it? Who is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: -- at the point in the narrative in which his character will arrive. But, before then, let's go ahead and get to our announcements for the evening. First and foremost, we have a new merch item, I believe.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we do!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Laura, if you want to introduce it and possibly--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And if you notice, he's got a few canceled appearances there at the end because--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Because he died.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Because he's a traitorous bitch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, and it's pretty cool, so there's that. And that's in the store right now! Go check it out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh my god, right now.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Enter the Meat Man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: If we can't have Scanlan, at least we've got the shirt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's right. That's right.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe, maybe we'll see Scanlan in concert sometime.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And we'll be like, "We used to hang out with him before he was famous."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Under your lip. You got it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Announcements continue!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll be running a game on Saturday morning with the Guts, Girls, Glory group. And that is going to be a lot of fun. So you should come watch. Find the information at the official Dungeons and Dragons twitter, and we'll look forward to seeing you guys over the next couple of days up there as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'll be in Las Vegas this weekend for--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Gambling?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, for Gears of War event.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Ooh!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So if you guys play Gears of War competitively, come out and fight and then see me while I'm there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you going to play competitive Gears of War?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, cool, awesome! Also, next weekend, not this, but the weekend after that, I'll be at A-Kon June 8-11 in Fort Worth, Texas.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I went to college there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: One of the few guaranteed ways I'll have an opportunity to interface with people, so you don't have to wait in line for it necessarily. It's an add-on to your con ticket, and if you're there, the proceeds of that ticket all go to the Texas Scottish Rite Hospital. So it's a cool event, happy to support an awesome charity, and hopefully get to see some of you guys there. Wednesday Club, Taliesin, what you got coming up?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're talking about the Young Avengers this next week. We just finished Wonder Woman; it was a great time. We wore tiaras and capes and talked.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was really good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Young Avengers?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to be talking about the Young Avengers which are--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kid Hulk, Kid Iron Man.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You are-- Hulkling. And Iron Lad. But we're going to be talking about the teenage superheroes of the Marvel U, specifically the ones who take the Avengers name, and they're really fun and the modern take on them is really going to be influencing a lot of the stuff that ends up on TV and it's going to be a lot of fun. They're some of my favorite books; they're badass.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome, thank you, Taliesin. Check out Wednesday Club. And of course we have Talks Machina live on Tuesday next week, about this episode you're gonna see tonight, at 7PM Pacific Time here on Twitch and Alpha, hosted by our fantastic Brian Wayne Foster.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Brian Wayne Foster!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, so check it out, then.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I've got one.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What you got?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't put it on the list.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, you didn't.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I didn't get to give him his birthday present last week, and now I do get to.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (shrieks)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I just remembered it was your birthday.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh my goodness.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I wrapped it all pretty, open it up.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Okay, with a thank-you in advance and afterwards as well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Open it up!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We'll edit this part out, right? I just meant the unwrapping.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's a ring box.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Please be a turd.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's just a pile of blue poop.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh. Oh my god.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes. Not big enough. It's a-- aw, man-- it's beautiful.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is it?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's a ring and it's got raven feathers on it and a little black gem. And on the inside it says, "Do not go far from me."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aw! Wow, twinsies.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're welcome. I don't know if it will fit you, but you know, happy birthday.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is it a genuine gold-style ring?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it fit?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It fit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I guessed it! Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Love it. That's a great birthday present.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you guys want to do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I, Taryon Darrington, would like to call to the rest of the gang and say: Wait, before we fly away, hold.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Superman.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay. Thought it was some sort of power move.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are we positioned, again?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you have the broom riders. You have Percival on your broom. You're flying with your wings. And everyone else is on the carpet.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would like to just sort of shout to my friends. Oi, can we, just before we go, could we maybe just swoop down one more time? Just a quick flyby. I have an idea. I feel like we need just an insurance policy when we go talk to the Myriad fellow. I was wondering if Kiki here could maybe throw a spell down before we leave? Is that something?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You just go down by yourself, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you have any spells left?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do still have some spells left. It depends on what you want to do, though, and what I have prepared.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well here's a question: can you make it look like the mouth of the cave isn't there anymore? Has caved in or is covered in dirt or rocks or something?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can. I have a few options for that.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Why do you want that?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I feel like when we talk to the Myriad fellow, we have lost our bargaining position at this point, because we did what he asked. But if we hide the mouth of the cave from him, then we have information that he needs, like where did it go, how do you get in, that kind of thing. I was also hoping maybe dear Pike could leave some sort of a trap, again as just an insurance policy.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Like a glyph situation?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, some sort of a thing that would explode when someone comes by. But I know it's crawling with characters down there, so I don't-- should we wait? I don't know.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I could do such a thing.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It covers a 150-foot cube, which I don't know-- How wide is the hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is it a 150-foot cube? That would cover pretty much the sinkhole itself. Do keep in mind the agreement was to cleanse the mine, not just of the creature but of the infestation.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we have to kill all the fuckers?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or at least enough to the point where the infestation is no longer an issue.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Tary, can you tinker up some Raid real quick?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I cannot. Wait, we have to kill more of these fuckers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe we just get high enough that they can't get to us with the acid, and then we just fire things down at them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roughly speaking, how many of those did we see when we came up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see in the moonlight-- you can see the walls moving.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, we can if we gather them in one place. Are they attracted to anything like shiny things or movement?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We need bait.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Us.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're not sure. They seem to have been drawn by the sounds and the movement of the combat you had at the bottom of the cavern. It took them long enough for the battle you had to get down there, and now they're skittering back up the wall as you guys, with your torchlight, are making your way up towards the bank

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I might just start shooting there if they keep coming.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: T.D., do you have anything that lets you teleport us all?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. Not really. I can become invisible and fly down there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Do you have any good terrain modifier something to trash them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So they're attracted to movement and sound. Percy, you have a very loud banging thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If we can get them all clumped together, I can throw down a few Fireballs and Flaming Spheres and probably take a lot of them out. But I need them clumped together.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do we have that's dead in the Bag of Holding right now? Let's just start throwing them down some things to eat and I'm going to start making some noise.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are they still on the walls?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can see a lot of them are still making their way towards the mouth of the cavern. There's probably about 25 or so that are gathered around the outside. Some of them are spreading a little bit out, trying to get towards where you are on the edges of the hole. If you wanted to move towards the top, you might draw them towards the edge.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's fly above it and I'll take a few shots and we'll just start dropping things down.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: One other idea. What if I go in as bait, make a lot of noise, and as they swarm I throw Whisper and throw it into his shoulder blades, and then on I'm piggyback.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. What? Why? They're already at the top.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yes, but would the Fireball, where they are, encompass them all or-- I'm just saying if they--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not all of them, but I can get a lot of them.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I can also throw some Fireballs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, we can Fireball together.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Percy and I just fly up and we start firing down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to start making noise and just boom-booming.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I point to a spot for Percy to see if I can get them to gather there, and I start readying a Fireball to launch.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so the two of you fly over to that side, and you start making Bad News explosion clatter as your gargantuan firearm just (gunshot noises).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, some shots at them as I go.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you take one or two of them down through repeated shots as their armor cracks and breaks and you hear (dying noises).

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll throw some meat down there too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is the noise centered on your gun, though, and not down below?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, but they'll gather in the spot to get to it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: They watch as you fly above, and you can start see them shooting these jets of acid in the arc as it begins to spray through, and you mark a little bit to stay just out of that range as you continue to do so. But the noise you are making is-- you're watching them slowly cluster up beneath where you guys are.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, let me know when it looks like a good cluster.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You got a pretty good cluster, you could probably get about ten in one blast.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, let's just throw down a big ol' Fireball.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All righty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 20-foot radius.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (sings) You shake my nerve--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (sings) -- and you rattle my brain.

lines.name: TRAVIS, ASHLEY
lines.text: (sing) Too much love drives a man insane.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Goodness gracious, great balls of fire!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And with that, for the sake of brevity on this standpoint, you wait until they begin to gather into one space, and with a singular Fireball, Keyleth, you watch as (explosion) you send four of them screeching down, falling into the pit from the blast, while six of them appear to be heavily wounded or burned to a cinder and run off screaming, before collapsing and then smoldering maybe 20 feet from the pit. More swoop up to gather into that space, now that that explosion has drawn their attention as well. And you see a few stop for a second, smelling the ruin of their companions, and you see a moment there to shoot another Fireball as soon as they're gathered. (explosion) This one finishes off any of the stragglers there and heavily damages a handful of others. You watch now, over the period of time of you both shooting, you taking arrows and what's available, over the next five to six minutes or so, you guys cut down the numbers to about half what they were. And there's now just broken wreckage of ankhegs just torn open from the explosion, their chitinous armor fractured and open with the smoldering innards burning and sizzling from the impact of the fire. They start to slow their ascent as more and more of them begin to die, and you watch as they all begin to burrow back into the earth, scattering deeper into the ground.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey... Vax, do you still have any of that--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A hundred episodes, yeah. Five years, a hundred episodes later. Do you still have any of that poison? That poison-- anybody have any poison?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I do!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You have poison?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yep! Yep, do you want some?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, I was thinking--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it. I pull out the jug and I yell, "Poison!"

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Splashes around inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's pretty good, Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want to drink it?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Well, no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No. It's really hardcore, if you do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ah, another time. I'll raincheck you, bud. Do we still have any more orc or boar parts?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, we've got an orc, like, calf, and a foot, and it looks like a skull, covered in like, pasta sauce.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, like actual Raid. Like Raid. Like if we dip, maybe, some food in poison and throw it down there, everyone that's left will come and eventually eat it and die.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we have, like, 40 or 50 of them left, right? And they're burrowed, now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of them have burrowed and some have gotten wind of the wreckage and ruin--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) I wonder if we could send fire into the caves where they've burrowed?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Or you've created tsunamis, as well, d'you think you could flush them out?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could-- I do still have my sixth-level spell, I could attempt to get to a few of their tunnels and collapse their tunnels.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can you fill the whole tunnel with water and drown them?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I could--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Too big. Too big.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What's too big?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: To fill the whole tunnel with water and drown 'em?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's a lot.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can't create chemicals, can we?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughs) Your mind.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hm, no, not really. I can create water, but I don't think it would be enough to flush them out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I just made this poison for, like, no fucking reason? (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We could do shots. I'm just kidding.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, you volunteered it very quickly.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we just above the hole?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're above the hole, holding the jug--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I take initiative and I take the orc leg, dunk it in the poison, toss it, then I take the last-- this is the last orc piece in the bag--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is that remnants of Dork, still?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I dunno. No, no. The ox is way gone, that poor bastard.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We burned through that ages ago.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Two little orc parts, now poisoned and...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Two-- they're very soft. Very, like, long-cooked lamb, just dripping off the bone, you're like-- throw it off there--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We might have some stuff in the Bag of Colding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Were they in the Bag of Colding? No. They're definitely soft.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: If I do like, a Commune with Nature, and then, because I know they're already--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Build a commune with nature?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Commune with Nature, and I--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whoa. Glass houses, and all of that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I like the image of a spell that-- I just like a spell that creates a hippie commune somewhere in your fantasy world. I think it's pretty cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I thought that was Conjure Fae.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: True enough. Continue, what are you doing?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I, because I already got a map of their tunnels. Can I then do Move Earth to, like, try and collapse?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the sense that as burrowing creatures, collapsing the tunnels might slow them down, but they'll probably still dig their way out.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What are the chances I have materials for making explosives on me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, enough to maybe, like--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, but like just the materials, not the time to make them, but just the materials. Because one of the materials in making TNT is diatomaceous earth. And if it's micronized diatomaceous earth, that means it's actually an insecticide.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Fucking Taliesin Jaffe. What are you talking about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Specifically for hard-shell insects.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I have an idea! I have an idea.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pike has an idea!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You wouldn't have anywhere near enough to do what you're trying to do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, wait, wait!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I would like to cast Earthquake--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: And maybe I can wiggle it all closed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Okay. So you cast Earthquake, what's the casting time on that?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's just one action.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So you look there and focus for a second, close your eyes, and you guys watch as the edges of the sinkhole begin to shift. The single tower that was partially collapsed? Collapses into full bits of rock and rubble, and some of it spills further into the tunnel as the tunnel begins to cave in. Basically, you fill in the rest of the sinkhole, and the mine now drops 25, 30 feet as the rest of the earth comes and fills it in. Eventually, the rumbling slows and comes to a calm, and you see now there's a dip where the space in the forest was-- it's like a big bowl, and some of the trees fall into it and get buried in the earth and stone as it collapses inward.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love that everybody was up here bickering and Pike just went "hm." (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few moments pass, and you watch as some of the ankhegs begin to pop out, like the collapsed tunnels have forced them to begin burrowing their way to the surface to orient themselves. You watch as about five, ten, 20 or so of these begin to emerge, and as they emerge they look around the space. And you watch them looking at each other and sniffing the area--

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to Fire Storm them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're going to Fire Storm them?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just let Pike off the leash.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, by the way, I can create a holocaust? Is that what you're doing? (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sings) Pike can end this world in a holocaust, in a holocaust-- All right, so. As everyone's marveling over your Earthquake, little Pike goes, "And also--" And you watch as about 30 or so of these creatures have now emerged, and they're all communicating with each other, and their antennas are going by, and they're beginning to look around-- and this streak, this zigzag of burning flame just tears across the base of this bowl and just incinerates about 20 of them. You now see them immediately smoldering, turning to ash, these blackened clusters of heavily charred husk, and the others that came to the surface just scatter into the forest. You get the sense that the ruin you've left, the collapsing of the tunnels and the rather large portion of their populace that you've left destroyed, there's probably not much of an infestation left here in the mines.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, not too bad, Vasquez.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did we also destroy the mine?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, it's still there, it's just been filled in.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Plus, technically isn't the point of a mine to, like, dig out holes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now they can dig extra. The Etch-A-Sketch has been shaken.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's none left? They're all gone?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I mean, that you saw come to the surface gathered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think we did a good job.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We could've smushed those and gotten so drunk.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do you feel, Tary?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's pretty awesome. (laughs) Yeah, I think mission accomplished. Let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I think we did it. Let's get the fuck out of here.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So. You guys make your way back towards Deastok-- Yes. Make your way back towards Deastok. You still have access to your Wind Walk, since it's not concentration, it lasts a while, so quickly enough, with your equipment in place, you guys can traverse rapidly back to the city in which you began this journey. You make your way back to The Grumpy Lily, introduce yourself to the two denizens within, with the phrase, if you recall.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chicken and biscuits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Many, the Many, yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And as soon as you enter, his eyes are trained on you. Whether it was expectant or just sheer luck, or his eyes are always trained on whoever enters the door, as soon as you enter the establishment, you watch as his smile cracks the sides of his mouth and his-- the edges of his eyes, the little crows' feet curl up a bit. And he motions you over.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you think he has friends? He's always alone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I'm going to start eyeballing the room while sis goes and talks.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is Camilla still playing music?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The musicians are not currently playing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What time is it now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, it's early morning. I'll say for the purposes of the hour that you got there, best that I can recall, it's like 1:30 in the morning. It's pretty late.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Excuse me, may we sit and talk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But of course. Have a seat."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you. We have done our share of the bargain, and we're here to cash in our chit, as it were.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His head looks at you. "You did not leave but a number of hours ago. Am I to expect that you "have completed this task already?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we're really, really good.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And you should know that if you've apparently been watching us?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Her snow-blind eyes now go pure white. And there's just a moment where you watch as her head begins to drift back like a slow hinge.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do I recognize this spell?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do not.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At least not this form of casting. After a minute or so, her eyes come back to their snow-blind appearance, her fingers curl back in and with a very small voice she goes, "The mine is "cleansed, though the mine is also collapsed." Korshad's looking at her, and goes, "But you say "it is cleansed, yes. Of everything?" She gives a nod. "It is free." He looks back to you all with a very sly, begrudging brow, one eye still partially closed. "Very well. We will send men to confirm "the depths of this, and operations will begin. If at any point it is discovered that this was some "sort of charade or the means of our agreement were not met fully, we will be happy to make sure the "rest of the Darrington estate falls back squarely under our grasp. However, for the time being and "if what you say is true..." He reaches under the table and sifts through a small sack that he had held between his feet and ankles, pulls out a heavy piece of parchment. "The deed to the "Darrington estate. Signed over to one Taryon Darrington."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Might I make a few more requests? When last we spoke, we spoke in vague terms. There was some cash talked about, and also a place for my family to make a little bit of money or food. There's a farmhouse nearby our main estate. It's nothing special, a few acres of land. I would love to keep that as well so that we can have a source of food for the winters.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check, Mr. Doe-Eyed Young'un.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Blink-blink!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Only time will tell. I'll give you this farmland."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are most grateful.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But. If at any point your family comes back to me requesting any more inches in our agreement, "I will happily take it back."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Understood. I wasn't quite finished yet, though.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He leans back in his chair, his arms now being removed from his mouth and going to an expectant cross.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Times 20. What we've just done for you has given you access to as much money as you could ever want, and I feel that's valuable. My family will require a bit of spending money to get ourselves back on our feet. We are... accustomed to a lifestyle, and we'd like to maintain it for a little while at least. I'd say 50,000 gold should be about enough to last us for a year or two.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He nods, leans forward. "Then you'd better start saving."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What if I sweetened the deal? We have among us an amazing sorceress who could open that mine up for you with a flick of her wrist, save you hours and hours of work. Possibly back-breaking work that could cost the lives of many of your men.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "That would be a very kind gesture towards the state you left the mine in."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (clears throat) So that's a maybe?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Let's call it the last thread of my patience, young Darrington."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Duala, you may return to your quarters." "Thank you very much." She gets up and looks past you all with a nod, and then her guardian escorts her back into the chamber as Korshad is just trained on you. "What I have given you is far more than many in my position would. I will work hard "to make sure that this softness I have displayed does not hinder my reputation. And the more you "press, the more you may be the end of that softness, my friend. I recommend you stick to the "deal we've made. Be happy that I've shown any mercy. And be on your way."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. I'll make do, and we'll have to adjust our living standards, that's all.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Indeed. Perhaps your father might raise a finger or two and earn some money for himself."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll see. Thank you. Bidet.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Good evening."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He almost said it back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Almost.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're starting something.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He takes a drink, and sips it, and gives this motion with his hand as his eyes finally avert from Taryon and the rest of your group and he looks away with a contemplative expression. As he does so, you watch as the guards all begin to shift out of the crowd. And you watch as many of the various tavern folk that were laughing and drinking are all quiet now, looking upon the rest of you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's some Moriarty shit right there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you get the sense that pretty much everybody in this establishment, patron or not, are all keeping an eye on this. They're all part of Korshad's guard in some way, shape or form, and you've been given leave.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're totally right, he has so many friends.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I told you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Let's light it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You watch as Wence comes up to you, as this is happening, and goes, "Hi. Look. You seem like "very nice folk. You should probably..." (clicks tongue)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're leaving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay, good. Drink for the road?" And he gives you a little shot, to you, Vex, and goes, (tongue click).

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I just really like it here!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No. All right. You make your way out, back up through the Grumpy Lily, back onto the streets of the deep, deep dark morning hours in Deastok. What do you wish to do?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wow, that was weird, you guys. It was weird.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do we need to tell your family what we did?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Break the news to dad, yeah?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Right now. In the morning?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I guess maybe in the morning? They're probably all asleep now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, I haven't actually had the drink yet, I was afraid it might be poisoned.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, maybe not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to steal a sip of the drink.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (gasps) Percival!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I haven't swallowed it, I'm just going, hmm, hmm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How is he?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It numbs a bit of the surface skin, seems like a strong alcohol.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Congratulations, us. Maybe later.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We are a little beat up and stuff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We should probably heal up. Talk to your father in the morning.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We'll go to my house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Your house!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is now your house.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, it is.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whose house? T's house.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's in your name.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're a homeowner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could get a second mortgage!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could kick your dad out!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You get to pay property taxes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, god.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You could refinance!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I could refinance. I hear mortgage rates are really low right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hear the Myriad's giving really good deals.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you make your way back to the Darrington estate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. The guest quarters are cramped for the volume of travelers you have with you, but as you approach and knock on the door, there's a slight pause before your...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Berthold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes, thank you. Berthold, the brass-skinned dragonborn companion comes up with his nightcap on in front of his face, and he's got his little lantern. He's like, "I assume you wish to stay "here. I'll arrange for... Come in, come in." He rubs his eyes as he leads you inside. It's quiet and still, and the house is dark. No light aside from the small lantern that Berthold has, and he leads you on the bottom floor to the guest quarters, which are two separate rooms, each with a singular bed. You watch as he begins to grab cushions from various chairs and display sofas that are covered in dust, that haven't been sat in for a decade, at least, and is trying to arrange them in a haphazard floor bedding scenario.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to see where he's going with this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He gets to a point where he gives up and goes, "Oh, there. Good night." And walks away.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we've slept in blanket forts before.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Not the first, not the last.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I get the big cushion!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's got a bar in the middle.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Display furniture sucks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You still do have your room, Taryon, if you want to use it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: My room? Oh, yeah, of course I'm going up there.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, really, you're going to leave us down here? Fucking high-born piece of shit?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll stay back down here with the pillow fort thing. Fine. But after they go to sleep, I go upstairs and go back to my bed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, then. Make a stealth check.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, Jesus. Four.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Half of you open an eye in the middle of the night as you hear the creaking of the wood flooring.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just going to the bathroom!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: By the way, do you have any beast changing left in you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I do, yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could you go Minxie for me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, kinky.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Gross, we're all in the same room.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yes, why?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I want a pillow.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That is the most Brian Blessed thing ever.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You could've just used Trinket.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Trinket farts are an issue. Then again, so are Minxie farts.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I want to get in a circle, like a dog, on one of the cushions.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You turn around three times.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's how rock gnomes sleep, they do a little circle around the cushion.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I just turn into Macklemore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. So you make it to your room, left as it was. Most of the furniture is covered in sheets, but untouched as to where you left it the last time you were here. There's a firm layer of dust across most of it, and as you step into the room, with each step you can see the footfalls leaving a small trail on the floor. You have a large shelf of books that line the right wall. You can see the footsteps to and from the bookshelf where it seems like your mother has taken, here and there, little elements of your collection. You see the covered outline of your workbench, which inhabits the far side of the chamber, and a familiar smell of old oil and leathers immediately causes a flood of memories to hit you of growing up in this space. You do see, poking out from one of these sheets, some of the leftover pieces from when you constructed your first Doty, and you see the armored hand, partially open with some of the gears and runes only partially put into the hand and then discarded and left to the side, and it also reminds you of those years. You have this nostalgic wave hit you as you pull the sheet off your bed, and dust it out, and fluff your pillow, and for the first time in a long time, have a night's sleep in your own chambers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll cuddle with the Doty arm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's very cold, but sleep does take you. You guys finish your evening's rest. You awake. After the stress of the previous battle of the day, you all tend to sleep in for the most part, plus the late hour of eventually getting to rest. You all eventually come to later in the morning, closer to noon, but as you wake up, you wake up to the smell of food being cooked. You make your way out into the central foyer area of the estate, and you can see Berthold is running around the kitchen, desperately trying to put together whatever meal is viable, and eventually shouts out, "Breakfast is served!"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What you got, Bertie?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's... dinner time! Dinner you're having-- breakfast, staying the night, "and the market wasn't open."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Potatoes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I made some stew. Breakfast stew. It's just stew, "but you're having it for breakfast. Some mushrooms. That's it. I am sorry."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: A lot of carbs.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's like Comic Con all over again.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this how we're supposed to eat in the house of Darrington, Tary?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We just used up all of their food and they don't have any left.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. I'll talk to the help about this.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Can't you pop a crystal off of that helmet of yours and make a banquet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. I could burn us all alive, though, with one of them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Not the same thing.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Did we ever discover whether or not the magic jug does coffee?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Only one way to find out.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Only one way to find out. Hold on. Be my guest.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Americano.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How about tea?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tea.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It can make alcohol and poison, but it can't make an English breakfast? Bullshit.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: English breakfast ale!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Baked beans and sausages and-- ! No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, breakfast ale. That works.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you guys complete your breakfast, you notice that eventually Maryanne's voice begins to echo through the stairway. She comes down and goes, "My word, Berthold, what are you cooking this-- " She comes down. You can see her hair is curled in front of her face and pulled back and tied up into this tight bun in the back, and she's just wearing this long, deep blue robe over her casual silk blouse attire and pants. She glances down, holding onto the railing. "Good morning."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good morning, sister. These are my friends, Vox Machina.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hello.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog, Pike, Vex, Vax, Percy, Keyleth.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Pleasure. Brother, I wasn't aware we had company staying."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I travel with a group now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've heard. I just didn't realize..."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I bring news, and I know it's early, but could we have a little family meeting over breakfast?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's super important.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you such a stink eye. "I'll go speak to Father."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And Mama.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And Mama." And she heads up the stairs.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: She seems nice.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She is not.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like her a lot.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: About five minutes pass, and you hear the sound of multiple footfalls as the rest of the Darrington family makes their way down. First you have Maryanne, same attire, but she's a little more put together. You can see now she's left the robe behind to have more of her classic formal presenting-to-company outfit. Behind her you have Mariya, your mother, who is in practically the same outfit she was in yesterday. She really doesn't seem to care at this point, it's more about being comfortable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sweat pants!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: A few feet behind, to his own entrance, there you see with his thick mutton chops and a tied-over, deep red, burgundy coat, Howaardt Darrington. As they all enter, Mariya immediately runs forward and goes, "Oh, I didn't realize breakfast was going to be made!" She goes over and takes a little plate and starts filling it with rolls and potatoes. She goes up and rubs your head a little bit and kisses you on the forehead, and goes, "It's nice to have company."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's nice to be home.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you want some stew?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Howaardt, at this point, is sitting back next to Maryanne, and goes (clears throat).

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, did you want some as well?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm fine for now. Your sister tells me that we are to have a family meeting."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes, and with your permission, I would like to invite my friends to stay for it as well, as it does concern them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Charmed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Very well."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I bring you news, and I bring you a proposal, and as a businessman I hope you'll listen to both.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems keen at the choice of words. "Yes, my son."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: First, the news. It's good news. First, I will not be marrying this Lydia person. There's no need, and also I think we all know I would not be happy in such a marriage, and we should all be free to pursue whomever we love. That's beside the point. It's not necessary, because I have made a deal with the Myriad. A deal that will spare us from any danger, and clear us from all debt. We-- Well, they, really, carried out a task for the Myriad that has absolved us of the debt that you ran up, and we are free and clear.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks to Mariya and Maryanne and softens up. "I am... If what you say is true, then this is "indeed a great day, and I owe each and every one of you a great debt. We owe you a great debt."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not get ahead of ourselves, but thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Forgive me, but you have sullied our name.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: His jaw clenches tight as he clears his throat and his hands go back behind his body.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We are going to move to the farmhouse, where we will all live as a family. We will tend to the farm, and we will raise crops together. Our home will be turned into the Darrington Fund, for charitable giving, where people who are down on their luck can come and live and get back on their feet. Now, such a fund will need donors, and you have many contacts in the business world. You, and possibly sister, could run this foundation and spread goodness all over Wildmount, instead of badness and evil.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (heavy breathing)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take a step forward and unsheathe a dagger an inch and say, we're going to keep this civil today, aren't we?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You have no right to talk to me... You stand here and shame the work that I've done, and "given my life to secure and give to you and your sister, and to uphold the mistakes that my father "made to the best of my ability and fix them. And you waltz in here after a year of adventuring and "just expect me to accept you throwing everything I've worked for into the sewer?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You don't even own your own house anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It wouldn't be that way if you would've just married that girl."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We will fight for justice, and win battles against evildoers, and spread the Darrington name around the continent. I know I'm getting ahead of myself, but I feel like if we embarked on this new adventure together, it could save our name and repair our relationship. As a businessman, I'm asking you to consider it. Because your other options are... Well, they're not great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a persuasion check

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The deal we made with the Myriad, sir...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No one would know that you were forced out of your home. Everyone thinks that this was your choice, that you're being charitable.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to see if the fates can help me.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You're going to use it now?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Cash it in!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's a 25.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's a moment to do it. You see as Mariya, your mother, has now moved to the side of Howaardt, holding his arm. "Honey, there was no other path. This is a gift." He pulls his arm from her and begins to walk toward you. You watch as Maryanne has put on a shocked face, gone pale white, and for a moment, the facade of the adult gives away to the child. "Father." As he walks up to you, you watch as he brings his hand up, and falls into his own hand, and falls to his knees on the ground. He's shaking, he's quaking. His fist is clenched there, and he slams it into the ground, once, twice, a third time, each one a resounding knock of him hitting bone and skin against wood. And he does it again, and again, and again, all the anger and fury being focused into this. As he stops, you can see the blood pouring from the side of the knuckles, and his hand is shaking. He stops and looks at it. (deep breath) And for the first time-- not even the other evening, in which there was a sort of feigned softness to him, that you have read through before and seen-- for the first time you see your father as a broken man. He looks up at you. "I lost "everything. I did this to us." He looks back at Mariya, and Maryanne, and to you. The dampness gathering down the side of his wrinkled cheeks, gathering across the stubble on his chin, and vanishing amongst the cluster of thin, bristly facial hair. "I'm sorry. I'm sorry."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am, too.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He looks about at this point. Now, his focused anger has subsided, and this emotional moment realizing that there are strangers at the table, and he (clears throat) "If you could please "give us a bit of time." His hand still clustered there. He looks over to Berthold, who ushers you all out front, you staying behind, Taryon. About ten minutes or so, as you're all awkwardly waiting outside in the quiet. The cloudy day that originally brought you into Deastok is breaking in places, you see hints of blue sky peeking through, and a little bit of sunlight occasionally finding its way across the cobblestone roads of the cityscape. You hear the occasional tweet of birds as they jump from tree to tree. And in this silence you really get to take in the surrounding beauty of this town, even as oppressive and gloomy as your arrival may have been, and the tenseness of the work you had to do in this space. You allow yourself to realize that this is a nice town. You hear the door open once more from the front of the estate, and there you see Maryanne, wet on the cheeks. "My father would like to speak to you, if that's all right."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "And I'm sorry." He looks back over his shoulder at Tary, who's a few feet behind him. "I'm sorry." Then he walks back into the house and just--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sir.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stops a little bit and looks back over his shoulder towards you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Second chances are a gift. I pray you don't squander it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not the first man to panic at the loss of his shackles. I hope you eventually enjoy the freedom that you've just been given from your legacy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Legacy." He continues walking into the house.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sir, may I have your hand, please?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He stops. "I'm sorry, what?"

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just your hand that's hurt.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I appreciate the offer, but this needs to heal on its own."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Understood.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "This pain shouldn't be fleeting." And he walks away inside.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I have a question. Is there any more stew?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My stomach is making noises, I'm so hungry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I feel like we could find better stew. No offense.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes. My place is here. I'm coming back to Whitestone with you, I have to. I have to retrieve Doty and my personal belongings.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But we just finished your room!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I'll come visit. I was thinking, for my Darrington Brigade, I'll need lots of recruits, and maybe I could get some down in Whitestone. You know, fine fighters and young trainees. I even have an idea for my first adventuring partner. I think if I sold my old armor, I could afford that drow for a year, and she lives close by.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is a lot.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I don't think that's a half-bad idea. We're all very proud of you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So proud.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's very impressive.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I understand legacy and responsibility and I think it's very admirable of you to recognize your place.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've always known that I was not fit to travel with you all, and I know that you all love me, but you don't really like me that much. Oh, I can be kind of a dick sometime.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I like it! I like dicks!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: A year ago, it was definitely true, but now...

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What about the bakery?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, the bakery! I'm really bad at baking too.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, but you're so good at selling stuff!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I feel like some people come in just to see you and see you smile.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're definitely the face guy! You're the good salesman!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure, that makes sense.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You can sell anyone on a shitty cake that you baked!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll come down and visit a lot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What's a lot?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You know, once every year, around Winter's Crest. Well, I mean, it's a long way, and I can't Tree Stride or whatever you call it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I can come get you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to go get my robit. All right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, don't expect us to be okay with this. That's not going to happen.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I mean, to be fair, Tary does have a point. I also have a responsibility, and...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're leaving, too?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. Well, technically...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm the chief of my people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh my god, are we all breaking up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?! No!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're not doing this now! What's happening? What is happening?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I didn't mean to do this! I didn't know this was going to happen!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no more discussion until there's food and caffeine. This is madness.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We're just hungry! We're just hungry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is hunger talking.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We're just feeling hangry as shit.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Everybody needs to calm down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We need brunch.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: All right. We'll get brunch back in Whitestone, right, and get out of here?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Let's go to Whitestone. Let's leave. I don't like this place anymore.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, you shut up.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I need to go say good-bye to Mama, that's it, then I can go, all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can come to Whitestone anytime.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She literally has no money to travel.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We can make it happen.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Well, say your goodbyes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right, I'll go find Mom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She's inside right now. As you walk inside, she's sitting at the table where everyone had breakfast, she's eating what was on her plate, alone. She turns around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Days, maybe a week.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Be back, please."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In the meantime, though, can you think about something for me?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, what do you need?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The charity. Papa and Sister can run it, they have smarter business acumen than I do, but the brigade, I was wondering if you wanted to do it with me. You have a taste for adventure, you could help be our manager! Tend to us when we're injured...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Taryon, I'm far too old for adventure."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't think that's true!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As an organizer?"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And when I come back, we'll talk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right. But if you're going out and you're coming back, and I'm to help, "bring back a better outfit."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay! Do you have a color in mind?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Royal blue."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: On it. I give her a big hug.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She gives you a big hug. As she hugs you, her mouth gets near your ear and she goes, "I'm glad you listened."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Me too. Mama, this is going to be fun, fun, fun!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She sniffles a bit and pushes you away. "Now go, go! Hurry back! Be safe!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Maybe! All right, let's go.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Do we assume the form of clouds?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, no, this is probably a Tree Stride situation. Let's do that.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It would have been a very long cloud stride. Is it even possible to cloud stride?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's possible, it's just going to be a long journey.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Tree Stride!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Transport Via Plants. Tree Stride is a very different spell.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The sixth level teleport... transport...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know what you mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It is. Tree Stride just rolls off the tongue easier.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I know it does.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Plant Walk. Tree Trip.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Tree Uber.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Leaft.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sorry, pull the plug, people, wrap it up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find the nearest large tree and with a quick snap of your fingers, a flash of druidic energy, you watch as the tree form splits open, revealing the doorway. On the other side, the main thoroughfare of Whitestone. You step through and find yourself back in your home city.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: On the way out, I give the Sun Tree our secret handshake.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Like, a judo strike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You just killed the tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Quivering Palm the Sun Tree.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sun Tree is still doing it the first time, three years ago.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's so slow.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You knock on the Sun Tree a little bit, continue walking. First thing that catches your attention, the main square of Whitestone, largely around the Sun Tree, is fairly empty except for a few carts. It's mostly for traversing. There's a small garden that's in the early stages of being set around. As you walk into the main area, you notice that there's a lot of carts that are circling the north end of it, like a small caravan of sorts. You see a series of wagons, some horses that are tied off at a couple of hitching posts off to the side, and you see what appear to be tents and tables with various wares for sale. Fruits, vegetables, some exotic cloths and tapestries, clothing available.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is this a festival?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Traveling salesmen?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: My god, it's a shopping episode! I'm so excited! Just appeared out of nowhere!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do they have something in royal blue?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to buy so many imaginary things, Travis.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What's happening though, really?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, really, what is happening?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You don't recognize any of these people, necessarily. There's no reason, there's no calendar element to it. As you walk up, one of the nearest Pale Guard is doing a walk-through.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What's this all about?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Percival. Now that the trade routes are open, we're having "more caravans to and from Emon."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's a farmer's market!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Essentially. We're just keeping the peace."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's been several years. Why you should be even vaguely surprised by this reaction is baffling to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's baffling that you are so comfortable with it still."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent, carry on, keep shopping.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Of course, of course."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a farmer's market.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He walks off. Do you guys want to walk around?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's a farmer's market!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I need some fresh halibut right now!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Are they selling or are they just setting up?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this time they're selling. You see some of the populace has come out. You see delicious fruits, some swamp roots, there are some herbal setups that have things that are from Stillben and things that are not indigenous to the Whitestone area.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are there heirloom tomatoes?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm going to use Luck. No I'm not, I'm kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Best Luck use ever.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There's no such thing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find some nice tomatoes. They're real tasty-looking tomatoes. There's one oddities shop that has small baubles and little jewelry, trinkets that they have for sale. There's a lot of dried meats. There's no fresh fish because a lot of the fishing that's done locally doesn't travel very well on caravan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is there flowers? Is there a flower shop?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is a flower shop in Whitestone, but you don't really travel to bring flowers, they don't keep very well.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I assume the castle's going to be doing a run of this anyway, but I want to see the trinkets.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Some of them seem to be swirling. As you walk up, you see this gentleman in his early 40s, this long handlebar mustache that curls past the edges of his jaw, his hair is combed over to one side and slicked down. As you approach he's like, "Oh, hi! "Yes, I've heard of you, you're Vox Machina! Well, if there's a team looking for the things I have to "sell, it would be you!"

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's day-drunk.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: First off, how do I do the pleasure?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite impressively, actually.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Keep it in mind. Theobold Cans."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like the festival. Yeah. Just go with it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The Theobold festival, it's very popular.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have here acquired a few interesting things that may help you on your journeys. Here." He pulls out one of the vials and swirls it for a second. It has an orange-ish, yellow-ish color to it, and as it flows around its side, it has a thick movement to it, like a syrup. "This liquid, "upon being imbibed, will temporarily allow you to see, read, and speak any language you like!"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's very impressive.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Isn't it, though? So I'll put that one aside as a possible, yes."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is that for real, that one?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, yes, I should Identify that. I'll Identify that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You glance over and take a moment to concentrate. Yes, it is a Potion of Tongues.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, great. Thank you for reminding me that I do that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So. In the maybe pile? This is--" At this point, in the middle of this conversation, you specifically, Vex, you glance over your shoulder as you see the crowd parting off to the side. There's a large figure beelining in your direction.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I nudge my brother.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What the hell?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I head-nudge him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see short hair that's buzzed on the sides with a curl of dark in the front, a Superman S curl in the front. You see a big broad smile, a tusked smile. You see orcish blood in this figure as it approaches with a big sword across the back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I take an instinctive step forward, just a half step in front of Vex.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Maybe he'll kill us and we don't have to shop anymore.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No one can see you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We know it's there, though!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: There's an enchantment on it. It's actually this big.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh god. Oh god! Much, much bigger than Hardwick! (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you have been in the process of specifically keeping an eye out for a group of individuals, specifically looking out for the name or any mention of Vox Machina, you've spent a number of hours with no luck, frustrated. But you've made some friends in talking around, and then suddenly you hear someone shout the name from a distance. You glance over and see a cluster of individuals that match the descriptions you were given. You immediately beeline up to them. You watch as two similar-looking half-elves spin and give you the evil eye.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, friend.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Hi!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You look like you're headed this way, did you need something?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yes. I'm looking for some help.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, wow, yeah? What kind of help?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With you so far.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm with a group of these guys and we have a bit of a problem back in our homeland.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Which is where?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I have a problem with memory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do you remember your name?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: The phrase 'day-drinking' has already come up today.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, my name is Lionel Gayheart, but most people call me Chod.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Chod.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Although, that was my born name, but I call myself Lionel Gayheart, it's a better name.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's a much better name.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: On the end is '-hard' or '-heart'?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Gayheart.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Heart.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: People call him Chode.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lionel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: But, so, yeah, we've been having some problems and we need some help.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What kind of problems?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Like opening a peanut butter jar, or how big?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Or, like, dragon kind of issue?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: you've heard of the Meat Man? (gasping)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are you fucking shitting me?!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You guys know him?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, we know him.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I thought he was just big in our parts.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where are you from?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Is this what's happening right now?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we all paying attention at this point?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's hard to miss this guy show up.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Was trying to ignore it. Now I'm failing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm going to throw something again at Sam.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is Shorthalt around right now? Is this a prank? Is that was this is? Is this a joke?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I don't know jokes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He seems pretty lost on the name Shorthalt, but seems to be upfront with his intent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, wait, he does know jokes, or he does know the Meat Man?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I know the Meat Man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But you don't know jokes?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I don't know jokes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: How do you know the Mean Man?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Do you know Parchment, Boulder, Shears? Never mind.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: The Meat Man, he's my boss.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Really?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, what does he look like? Short guy?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, well, he's shorter than me, but, you know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where on yourself does he come?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Is he this size?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's a gnome.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, no, he's bigger than that.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Excuse me?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's the Meat Man, you guys seem familiar with him, you know what he looks like.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Is this the Meat Man we know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, not at all!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he pulling a Dread Pirate Roberts?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: He's not the Meat Man that we know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we don't know, maybe it is! Where are you from?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does he wear a beret?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm from an area where-- we're from the desert. It's like a desert area. We've traveled across a very, very far way. It was a long journey.

lines.name: LAURA, MARISHA
lines.text: Marquet?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Did you cross the ocean to get here?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yes, we crossed the ocean. We were on those wooden things that have, like--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The ships?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, ships! That's it!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ank'harel?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Ank'harel!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (gasps) We're getting closer! Oh my god!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Is your boss with you right now? Did he come with you or did he send you?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, I'm with him, well, he said he was around here somewhere.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Shut the

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Why, is that bad or good?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: No, real good. Real good thing.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's a real good thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But will you bring us to him?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, I need your help. We need your help! I'm kind of his messenger, I was supposed to find some--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is your first time being a messenger, is it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I don't mean any offense, here, but I was in the middle of a transaction, "if you don't mind, sir?!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll take the Tongues potion. How much? Come on, give it to me.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "7,000 gold pieces."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?! I don't have that much!

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What was the third one, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The third one?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The one you were about to say. We were going to hear you say it before--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Before you were so strangely interrupted.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: This is very important, but...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You didn't have it, did you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There's a ring."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A ring?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A ring."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What does it do?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Allows you to move freely."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it under a thousand gold?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Then goodbye!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're moving, we're moving.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Gaaah!"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We're getting out of his store front.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Wait, Chod! Chod!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Chode.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lionel.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Chod. But please call me Lionel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, you prefer Lionel!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yes, of course!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lionel's way better.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's Lionel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we call you Lion for short? That's fierce! I'm Keyleth.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I might get confused if you call me Lion, though, I'm just warning you ahead of time.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth. Nice to meet you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have a feeling you're going to get confused even if we call you Lionel. It's Percival, it's a pleasure, Chod. Hello.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Hello!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Taryon Darrington!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You're a fancy lad.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Vax. Vex.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is going to be difficult.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just say Vex.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Vex? And your name's Vex, too?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Call her little elf girl, and you can call me little elf boy. Could we meet your boss?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Hold on, Pike had a question.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Why is he your boss? What do you do? What kind of work are you in?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, you know, we do various things. I round up-- He likes to make sure everybody's in line back in our area. Sometimes he makes me (sighs) make sure people pay up, and--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, wait a minute, so he's like a bad guy?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, he's a good guy!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you a bouncer? Is he playing music and you're his bouncer? Do you rough up people who try to cause trouble?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, you know, in the nicest way possible, sometimes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Sure, that's what I do.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you know someone named Kaylie?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Kaylie? No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: But do you know a girl that looks kind of like the Meat Man?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, I'm talking to you, that's awesome!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey, that's great!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That might be a first. I forgot, so, I wasn't supposed to call him Meat Man. In these areas, he's known as Aes Adon. I think that's what he said.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aes Adon? But he's actually the Meat Man.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Maybe.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So we get to meet the Meat Man?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, we need your help. But I'm just checking you guys out first because he said I'm a real good judge of character.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And what do you think? What do you judge on us?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, you guys seem really nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You seem really great, too. You should probably take us to him, then.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah! It's nice to have to, you know, go do something with people where I don't have to hurt them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! We feel the same way sometimes.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So he didn't send you here to hurt us?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, no.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Just to come.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, well, we need to enlist your help.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hang on a second. Will you earmuffs? He knows what earmuffs are! That's good. Anyway, why would Scanlan send a messenger? He has the gate stone! And why him? Scanlan's smarter than that, right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe Scanlan's trying to play us and he accidentally sent someone that--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chode?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lionel!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aes Adon. I don't think it's Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's got to be Scanlan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, a lot of people could go by the alter-ego Meat Man.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What other weirdo would name themselves Meat Man?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Good point.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm also going to put out there that we all know we're going to go do this because we're desperate for anything to put off the inevitable goodbyes that we were heading towards. So let's distract ourselves for a little bit.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And, fucking Scanlan!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll see.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Look, he's still doing it! He does follow directions well.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Lionel!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If I were to trick us, that's how I would trick us.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lionel.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What? Oh, I was having such a nice story in my head. What is it? What do you guys want?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It shows.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Quite a bit of practice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's meet this chap!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, let's go meet him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There is nobody in there. It is just devoid of any people working there. You recall, because you were told to pay everybody to leave.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah. But he was here, so, yeah. I don't know, you guys, like, make yourselves comfortable.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is the craziest 48 hours, I swear to all the gods.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's cool. Aes Adon has the best mutton. He keeps it normally-- I don't think I made the mutton leave, so you can check the drawers.

lines.name: LAURA
