lines.text: I go search the drawers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: In drawers?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah! I start searching.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not going to eat any mutton from drawers.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He gave me free rein, I'm searching this fucking place.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You start pulling through the drawers. There is a piece of mutton in there. You get the sense that it wasn't stored there, more than maybe it was half-eaten and left there for later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 25 perception, I don't know, I'm just looking around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm looking for weirdness and traps.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Make investigation checks, you guys.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should I be investigating, too?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure. So, what'd you get?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Not good.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You find the partially eaten mutton. Vax, you find the tavern has many drinks on tap, it has a number of cups. Looks to be remnants of people that were possibly eating or finishing a meal that quickly left. The coffers for the tavern are gone.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No traces of poo anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No traces of poo, no.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan! Scanlan, are you here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear footsteps coming down a stairway on the far end of the tavern.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Who's Scanlan?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's this really creepy weirdo they always talk about.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, I don't think there's a Scanlan here, no.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Welcome, friends. You are Vox Machina, yes?"

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Who's asking?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Sit down, please. If you don't mind. You are guests of mine right now."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is this Scanlan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I want to roll a perception, I want to see if it's an illusion, if it actually is Scanlan.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an investigation check.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I told you, I don't--

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Chod! Good job." And he flicks you a gold coin.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What? Oh god! Jesus! Balls!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whispers!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Incoming whisper!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The Scanlan Shorthalt t-shirts are available on the store right now. Travis is wearing one. You can see it maybe on your screen. He's doing a little jig! Boop boop do boop boop! Boop boop! Buy your shirts today.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The hottest penguin I ever saw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "My name is Aes Adon."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Told you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'm but a humble merchant from Ank'harel, and I'm seeking to make some contacts in this "rumored emerging metropolis of Whitestone. Yes?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Now, I have information that may be of use to you, my compatriots have told me. And, should my "gatherers and whisperers be correct, in trade I would like to get some information from this one."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Possibly. What is it that you want to know?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Rumors tell me of these fabled Riflemen of Whitestone."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "While paltry mechanical imitations have occasionally come across the markets on our side "of the world, I hear that you were the designer of these instruments of death."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well, in the intent of expanding my influence in keeping the peace where I do "business, I would like to make a trade. This important information for you to grant me access "to your designs."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is this information? You don't even need to tell me what it is, but that would be worth quite a lot, and what you knew would have to be worth quite a lot.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Selling the secret recipe, man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "A compatriot of mine, whom you've already met--"

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (heavy, repeated sniffing)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "-- recently returned from an expedition I sent him on, where he stumbled upon a pyramid."

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: A pyramid?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yes. Does this pique your interest?"

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh no.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Ziggurat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "So, this is the information I have to offer."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Wait, he said Marquet, though.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Another one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you go inside of it?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No. No.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you see anybody around?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Did you see anything about it?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would request you hold that information until we make a deal."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Sorry, Aes. Sorry, Aes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, you can go ahead and tell us!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, he's my boss.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Does it count if it's a girl that he's talking to? I mean, it's not quite the same, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Silence! My deal is with you, Vox Machina."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You can tell us later.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What is this worth?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You should listen to him.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I guess it depends on what he thinks it's worth to us. What makes you think that we want this information so much?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I've had a compatriot of yours stumble through my city seeking information about, "apparently, something beneath your city. The whispers come to me. I saw a connection. From what "I hear, you've put quite a bit of energy into this darkened orb."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Traditionally.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I would not recommend that."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, if I were going to do it, it would have already been done, now wouldn't it?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Enchantment.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Thank you, Chod."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I think that was a threat.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was a very good threat!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Really? Was it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It was definitely a strong six.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How'd you hear about this compatriot? How do we know you're not selling us a song? Who was this compatriot of ours?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He said someone came through? He's talking about this guy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: My name's Lionel, you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I did not meet this individual, but apparently they belong "on the council of your country."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little bit more, please.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Blonde of hair. Traverses through arcane means."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? What'd he say?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Man or woman?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Woman. Blonde of hair."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Allura.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What is happening?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: She went to go find information about it, that's not strange.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's not bad, right?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What does the Meat Man mean to you?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Meat Man is before you. I don't know where you heard this title, but--" (laughter)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I told you guys, it's Aes!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There will be a conversation later."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But that is a business alias of mine that I've had for a short time."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You don't need to get upset with him for it.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We had a friend who we thought it might've been him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Keyleth, stay on task!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "There is no other Meat Man."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's kind of a sticking point for us. You're coming to us with one piece of information that we may be interested in, but you're accidentally tipping your hand towards something else that we want to know about. We know a Meat Man, and he is not you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you know... the Meat Man?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you know the muffin man?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This meeting is only happening because we were hoping to meet our Meat Man.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "If you are referring to the small one, he's been dealt with. The title is now mine."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Dealt with.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roll back a step or two. Dealt with how?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Dealt with in the way that anyone who does sloppy business: imprisoned. No longer of "consequence. I was next in line."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm sorry, you think that the title of Meat Man is so important that you had to kill or attack a gnome who also went by Meat Man?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "The Meat Man I take the title from was not killed by me. He was a great man. Small, but "resolute. Confident. Handsome as they come. He taught me everything I know. It is a shame that he "has been lost in chains beneath the city, but I am keeping up."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Such

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: So, you've taken on the title yourself.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I have, in his memory."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what city is he in chains beneath?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Beneath Ank'harel in its deepest prisons."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Did he tell you to take on his name?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "No, it was bequeathed by the others left behind in his absence. They respect me, and as "such, the Meat Man is I."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: The name was simply meat-ed out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's totally Dread Pirates Roberts-ing this shit.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't mean there aren't things on the table.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Something I can take back to my workers."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Here's a question: Why did Allura come to you for information?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Oh, she didn't come to me, but whispers came to me "that she was seeking this information."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right. So you have ears in all the right places.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Everywhere, my dear."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You said workers? Are you a foreman of some sort?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You could say that. I run a business in various goods. Some legal, and I make sure that "clients get them in a very forthright manner."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're sadly very protective of our copyrights, and my designs are not for reproduction. Attempts at reproducing them tend to end poorly. Many have tried; most have failed. If you wanted, perhaps, a few designed, that could have been a conversation, but so far, I'm not impressed by you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Well then, we have nothing more to discuss, then. Come, Chod."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay, see you guys later!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Before you leave-- prison. What was this other Meat Man's offense? Do you know?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I don't know.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't know anything.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, I don't know a lot of stuff. He doesn't tell me.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Do you like working for that guy?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, he's great, he gives me money and food and mutton.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What if we gave you money and food and mutton?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We have mutton.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: How much money does he give you?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I like working for him. He keeps me safe.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What about this guy?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What about this guy? For Wildmount! Your brigade!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, you got to start somewhere!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could recruit him!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wow. I mean--

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You were rough around the edges when we met you!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I feel like I should do earmuffs right now again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Also, guys, not to split hairs here, but his boss is literally right there, listening to us. So maybe we shouldn't be talking about recruiting his employee.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Your shiny friend has a point."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What on earth made you think that we would sell these designs to you? You obviously are paying attention.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "As you hopefully know, the intent of negotiation is to aim high."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Then bring your expectations. So perhaps not plans. But a few rifles, a pistol or two and "some ammunition would be enough to outfit my team."

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: A whole team. With one pistol.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: One pistol can do a quite a bit. One pistol can go far.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The problem is that once he has the designs, he can replicate them.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Reverse engineer.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't think he would be able to reverse engineer it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "But I have my artisans at my disposal."

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Wait, why did you think we would want this information?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make some business here, some gold and then be on "my way. But I was informed that you, Vox Machina, so widely respected, so strong, so rich, so "involved in yourselves and your worldwide endeavors, that perhaps a little more world-saving "might be up your alley, but maybe I thought you wrong."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How's giving you one of my weapons world-saving?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Because the information I give you in return may help save the world."

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You sound like you know about the stakes involved.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Just what I've been whispered."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We've met a lot of doom-seers. You sure you can stand up to them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I grow tired of this conversation. If this is a declination?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: At the very least, this is a conversation of whether or not you're ever going to do business in this city again and what that business is going to look like.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Do not worry. You'll not see this face in your precious Whitestone again." He stands up.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I do an insight check to see if I can glean any more of what he knows about this world-ending thing?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Insight check.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whisper!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Earmuffs! Earmuffs!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everybody earmuffs!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, Tary, Grog is about as smart as a golden retriever and he does great.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know! But this guy seems like he would lose a spelling bee to Grog. He's really dumb!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, up until a few weeks ago, Grog couldn't really spell, either.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We could hold a spelling bee!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's true.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is he still walking away?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's going over to the half-orc. He goes, "Come on, we're leaving."

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I look at Vex and Vax and them and I say, we know him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Give it a moment.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: There's something familiar about him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I go and I follow him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, he walks out.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He knows more than he's letting on.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Come!"

lines.name: JON
lines.text: All right, I'm coming. You guys should really reconsider, that's a word he just told me. I mean, he sounds scary and all, but it's really awesome stuff he has to share if you guys just shared back. Okay. See you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I follow him right out of the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Both of them walk out into the daylight and you follow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Aes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He turns around. "Yes?"

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I run up and I hug him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay! Full-body?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Just a big hug! And I go down.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Immediately, instinctively, he backs up and you watch as Vex's arms pass through the legs and thighs and grab onto something smaller on the inside.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Motherfucker!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Let's go.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What?! What?! No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Motherfucker! Motherfucker!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And let's go ahead and take a break! (screaming)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I'll kill you! I'm going to kill you!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Motherfucker!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How could you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Natural 20!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, well done, you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We're going to take a quick break, be right back here in a minute to pick this up. We're going to go ahead and have a Twitch giveaway in the chatroom for this awesome Wyrmwood complete system. This includes a dice tray, a dice box, a couple of fun things. It's zebrawood, which is nice. But, to win this, you have to go into the Twitch chat. The code for this is 'bardbarian." B-A-R-D-B-A-R-I-A-N. Barbarian, but with bard-barian. Cool. So, we'll see you guys back here in a few minutes.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You! Son of a

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my god! [break]

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hello, guys! And welcome back to tonight's episode of Critical Role!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Son of a bitch!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What did you say, again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They were all there? I thought she just followed me.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We were not there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, it was just you. You guys were still inside the tavern.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Lionel there, though?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He left with you.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lionel. Please. Go back inside.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What did you do? What did you do?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Go back inside the tavern.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Where's Aes? Where's Aes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am still he. Please, go back inside the tavern.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait for me there.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: They were nice people anyway. All right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Vex, you're now there, staring at the Danny Trejo-like visage of the Meat Man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll grab her by the hand and pull her into... Is there a back alley or a side place or a shadow anywhere?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: There's, maybe about 15 feet off, a little alley you could duck into, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Come with me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: When we're safely off the street, I take off the Hat of Disguise and reveal myself.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hi.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What are you doing? I mean, I knew it was you, but I thought you were going to reveal yourself to everyone.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Definitely tanner skin; that scar you saw under the eye, still there on Scanlan, and the clothing and the outfit design is much more Marquesian than you recall. Definitely more Gilmore than Scanlan.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Have you been there the whole time?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Not the whole time, but for much of it. I didn't know if I could talk to you all.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I hold his hand and just listen.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: There's a lot to talk about, but not here. I have appearances to keep up, I have people depending on me who work for me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you really the Meat Man there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I am many things.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Darling.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I am.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm not a bad guy. This is not the place to talk about this. Listen to me. Vex, there will be a time to discuss this, but right now, I'm casting Modify Memory on you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Don't you do it! I push him against the wall. Can I break it? Can I break it before he does it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make a wisdom saving throw. Actually, no, for this I'm going to have to ask you guys both to roll initiative. That's what this is going to come down to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Come on, Vex!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's not good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We got an actual dice roll in the game!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. So he begins, after saying this, casting the spell. What do you do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! I grab his hands and cover his mouth!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. I'll say go ahead and make a concentration check, so make a constitution saving throw. I'm going to have you... Let's see, for this... Just roll a d20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Constitution saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Do I add to it?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Roll a d20 and add your dex modifier to it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Dex modifier or dex saving throw?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dex modifier.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No! No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Oh, two ones! Two ones!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Everybody speechless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So as you go to push him into the wall, you accidentally hit between where his foot and the edge of the stone is and it causes you to stumble forward and slam into him. You fall over. You, in the process, she hits you in the side of the...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we accidentally kiss? Is that what's going to happen here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Almost, but instead, you both accidentally end up elbowing the shit out of each other. She falls over, you tumble over her and become this tangled pile of soreness. The spell is lost.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Damn it!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: However, you guys in the tavern, hear a (flurry of blows) against the wall on the outside.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was starting to follow. I push the door open...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You can't tell them! You can't tell them!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I hear that and I start walking out.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Holy shit!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shut up, shut up, shut up! Shush!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I bust through right behind Vax.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys all rush around to the alley.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You dick!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Now I run.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I knew you were familiar!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everyone, shut up! Shut up, shut up. If you need to do something, change back, do it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: How long does the hat take?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It takes an action to do the spell.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Hat on. (whoosh)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Appearances are important.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I make my way through. What's going on?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No one talks about Scanlan being handsome as much as Scanlan does. That was your first giveaway, mister!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're in an alley, though, off to the side, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're in a dark alley.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, then I'm giving him a big fucking hug!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's hard to do, but yes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, Lionel, everyone just charges out of the tavern, and you hear a big commotion and voices on the side.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What's going on, you guys? What's happening? Can I... I think they're attacking him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: At this point, you watch as the other one is now grabbing him, merging.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, it looks like they're attacking. So I want to protect him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: As he should.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What are you going to do to protect him?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can go ahead and just say.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Are you going to scare them off, are you going to attack them?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Kill them?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah. No! I want to scare them away, and...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you have an ability that does that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or you can try and intimidate us, and say something really scary, or make some noise.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, I want to do the Frantic Flail.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right. So as you're hugging him, you guys watch as the half-orc turns the corner, spooks, and then, suddenly, you watch as something beneath the armor glows briefly, and he starts flapping his arms, going (honking) right at you. I need you to make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It'll be explained later.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's not... Does it have anything to do with charm, or sleep, by any chance?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Nope.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No. Okay. All right. Oh, that's fine. 20.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Damn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so it doesn't spook you off, it's just a little weird, as this giant man is now honking and waving and flapping his arms at you. He doesn't seem to be affected by it, he just gives you a strange look.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's okay, stand down, Lionel. I can defend myself.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Because you know I'm good for... That normally works on everybody else.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are my best man, and I appreciate your concern, but these people pose no threat to us.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That is a really good accent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you're so good at that.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What are they talking about, accent?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: They are beguiled by our foreign ways and they are scared of what they do not understand.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: True.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's true. I'm going to start walking back to the inn, and I'm going to start pouring a lot of drinks and putting them on the table.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I do have information to share with you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We want to hear all of that information.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You still gotta give us the designs. No?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Why did you want the designs?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Percival's guns are really cool, and I've always wanted to have some of my own, and I used all of my ammunition over the year, and now I just have this pistol. And I produce the pistol. But it has no bullets! I don't know how to make any more bullets! I need more bullets!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are you a mafia don, Scanlan? Are you a bad guy?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll take off the hat.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Lionel, you watch as your boss for the past five months shifts into this tiny little man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Lionel, we'll talk about this later.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (screams)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have many forms and I am-- Did you just piss your pants?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'll go stand in the corner now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have many forms and I master magic that you will never understand, but know this: The money I pay you is real, so you still work for me.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That's true. Okay, I'm good.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're a good man. I'm sorry I do these things to you.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You're so tiny, though.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm strong of heart.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You haven't been that strong, but anyway.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I pull Chod, Chard, Chode...

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Lionel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lionel. I pull Lionel aside. And I grab him by the face, and I say, we need you to be coherent and honest during this. And I cast Enhance Ability and give him Owl's Wisdom.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'll take that. I'm not going to fight back.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It increases your wisdom. You get advantage on wisdom.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, but now I can't erase his fucking memory.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You've just been going crazy with that Modify Memory, haven't you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hey, man, it's my bag of tricks, all right?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: So are we going to do this in an alleyway, or are we going to go get a drink, and you tell us where the fuck you've been?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Should we go inside? It's an empty fucking bar.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Let's go back inside the tavern, but just know this. He doesn't drink, all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Whatever. Come on. We want to hear what you've been doing for a year. Come on!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Thank you for remembering.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You're my guy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys make your way back into the tavern.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It is set up.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You now have the delightful experience of roleplaying two characters, Sam, in the same scene.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Boy, that's got to suck.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Welcome to my world.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I can kill Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to go check on Doty! Look at the time! Good-bye!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Look, this is that guy we were telling you about for so long.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The skeevy asshole that you always talk about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, the skeevy asshole, that would be the one.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's pretty handsome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You would say that, wouldn't you?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I'll go with you, Tary.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike...

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: It's fine.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. I'll go, too.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? All right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to listen.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm curious. Talk to us, man.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Talk to them. Don't let them leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You all can stay. It's been a while.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: It has.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Yes, just stay. It's fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Is it, though, Scanlan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What would you have done if I had just decided to open fire on you?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I would've stopped you, darling. I knew it was him right away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I would've won and killed you. I mean, I'm super powerful and awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. But really. This was not a good plan.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Scanlan, there are some hurt feelings in this room, and it might be time to address those.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I know. I know. But for now, let's just catch up. What have you guys been up to for the last year?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, no, no. After you, dear. After you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'm chief of my people!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you did your Aramente!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did! I wish you were there! I mentioned you and everything in my speech.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That sounds nice.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Anybody else ascend to new heights? No?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. None of your business at the moment. Tell us your business.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where have you been?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I went traveling a bit. I did what gnomes do, I went into the forest with Kaylie.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, is that what gnomes do? They go into the forest? I'm so sorry, please continue.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Forest gnomes do. And we talked, and we sang songs, and we camped, not in the mansion, just in a tent. We had some good times and bad times together, and eventually we found our way to Ank'harel, and some stuff happened, yadda yadda, and I'm here now, you know?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I try to pass my hand through Lionel's stomach to see if he's actually Kaylie.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You feel tons of abs. It bounces off and hits you in the face with your own hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I was with you on that one.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Serious, serious abs.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Where's Kaylie now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She's with me, yeah? No, did we leave her back there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Kaylie's in Ank'harel. Essentially, you...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: She is... It's complicated, but right now, she is the Meat Man. She is back in Ank'harel, taking on the business while I'm off here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: How are you two doing?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Pretty good. We're a good team. Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Does she like you now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: 'Like' is a strong word.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's really not.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: 'Love' is a stronger word. That's why people use 'like'.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: There's that Owl's Wisdom right there.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Whoa. What just happened?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have advantage on wisdom saving throws.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's weird. It's new to me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We're fine, she and I. We're a team, and she's taught me some stuff, and I've taught her some stuff, and we operate together.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And what kind of operation do you operate?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: We went to Ank'harel to get a little simple revenge, and it turned into something more than that, and I didn't mean to, but I guess I became one of the three largest crime bosses in Ank'harel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: In a year.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Eight months, really. We traveled around close to here. We were only 20 miles away for most of the first couple months, and then it took us time to get there. Don't worry, though, I'm not a bad guy. I just sell things, trinkets, furniture, art pieces, antiquities, that sort of thing.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing dangerous?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nothing dangerous. All fake.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And to whom do you sell these things?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Rat bastards. People who deserve it. People with money to burn, and people who have done wrong in their lives. I take some back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Why now? Why have you come back? Not that I'm not overjoyed to see you, but I'm curious.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The ziggurat.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did you go inside?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Another? You didn't tell me there was more!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, I mean, there's the one you found, and then there's one here.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (gasps)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. Will you tell them what you saw?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, me and my buddies, we went inside this...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Can I clarify, these are all hired men of mine. They're not his buddies. I pay them all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Could be both.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, maybe they're friends now, but, okay.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, no, they're dead now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fair.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I guess, if they weren't buddies, then I shouldn't feel bad anymore. The bad feelings will go away. We went inside the mountain, following some people that... Do I call you Aes, or?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That's fine.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay. Aes here told us to follow some people.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I had learned of someone new coming into town and stealing some magical artifacts and leaving some dead bodies, and it wasn't my organization, and it wasn't any of the other two leading crime organizations, I found out through my whispers. So it was someone new, and I wanted to find out who it was, so I sent Lionel, my best man, and his buddies to investigate.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was a comma there.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So, yeah, and he knew he could trust us because we're awesome. We were going to go get some information. So we followed them into this big tunnel that goes into the mountain. We had to go through, it took a long time and we had to fight a lot of cool stuff along the way, but nothing important to this.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, all the details are good, just, when you tell a story, lots of details.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Lots of details?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah, paints a picture.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, I've never been good at stories.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're doing great.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: But when we got to the middle, we found a big giant pyramid. Or a ziggy-star-- what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ziggy stardust.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Is that what you call it?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ziggurat.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pyramid's good. We're with you, yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: We found a pyramid, and we saw all these guys hanging around it, and right at the top of the pyramid was this big black ball. It looked like a pearl, but it was giant. It was at the top of the pyramid, and these guys, wearing these really cool but scary hoods and robes, they were throwing stuff on the black orb, and it was breaking and absorbing the stuff. And then this one guy--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What were they throwing in?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, it was anything. Some of them threw treasure, some of them threw some real animals. Alive.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And a person.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I was getting to that!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Keep going. Keep going.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: And then one of the guys actually jumped in and it absorbed him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Did it look like he was in pain?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, it just went (sucking sound). And he was gone. And so I had to get out of there. By then, my buddies, they were dead and taken away. So I was the only lone survivor, and that's why you can count on me the most. He knew I would survive. Is that why you sent them? Because you knew only I would survive?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I assumed that... Yes?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: See, I'm the best. So that's what I saw.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Was it a lot of guys?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: There was a whole bunch of these guys in robes. It was really creepy.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And dark hoods, executioner-style.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yes, matching robes, and I got a really creepy feeling when I saw it, besides being in the middle of a mountain.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Roughly how many?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, I don't know. I mean, it was dark.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: More than us?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: More than you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: When you were there, it would've been about 12 or 13 of them there.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a lot of matching robes.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And they all looked the same? Nobody looked a little more important than the others?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It felt like...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How long ago was this?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: This was a couple months ago. I mean, you know, I lost track of time when we were on the ship.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I was asleep for most of the ship ride. I was pretty sick.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I get sick, too. I understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was hard to tell. His face is always green, so we couldn't really tell.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You guys were good. You guys gave me all the leftover stew that you had.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: So, wait, and then you saw Allura there? That's bullshit?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, that was all bullshit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm sorry. I lied to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Oh, you suddenly lied to us. Wow, I feel so shocked.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I still don't know what's going to happen. You all might draw your knives and kill me right now, I just wanted to get this information...

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, they won't kill you. I promise.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No one wants to kill you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well, that's debatable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You tried to get me to give you my gun designs?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just some ammo.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: For what?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: For my gun that I have.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You have a gun?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He stole it from you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Remember?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: No, you gave it to him!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I didn't give it to him.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do you want it back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, please don't give it back.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What's your best-case scenario here? What did you hope would happen? You'd come and tell us these things and then what happens next?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You would go investigate.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: With you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. You would go investigate and I would go back to my job.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's all you want. To help us out.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You traveled to a separate hemisphere to be a messenger.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It was only a couple weeks.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Can I insight-check him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sure.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Hard to read.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I've thought about you all a lot, during this year, and I owe you all an apology for leaving you, and I don't know what I'll ever do to make it up to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We deserved it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you didn't.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we didn't.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I've lived with that shame for a year.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you happier now?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Strong people, like this guy. That's you.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Me?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. And smart people, and Kaylie. And I'm a pretty big shot.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You're not so big anymore.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, it's a metaphor.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You always were.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That doesn't sound too bad to me.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Did you not feel like you had a purpose when you were with Vox Machina? I'm not judging you in the moment.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But I'm back, and I've given you the information, and you can tell me what you'd like me to do next.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, there is a point that we are all family, but we are also all friends, and there is that old saying, be careful of the friends that drag you down. Maybe we were dragging you down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to put some pistol shot in a small bag. What's Kaylie's mother's name? What is it? I toss it to him. Dick. And I leave. For the record, it's Sybil.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I think I hear something. Do you hear that? It sounds like small little violins that I hear. Do you hear that?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I forgot I had to talk to Percy about something. Bye. Good to see you.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You know, you've broken a lot of hearts, Scanlan. I think you're still a heartbreaker. And I leave with them.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they'll come around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I doubt it.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: No, I think she's right.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think more than anything they've just missed you, darling.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Can I tell you a secret? All this last year, I've known we would see you again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: He's full of shit. He totally said that you were never coming back. I knew.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's good to see you again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's good to see you all. I don't really know what to do now. I have... I really don't know what to do now. And that's a new feeling for me. I have information. We should travel back to Ank'harel so I can show you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Of course.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Whether to part ways, as friends or enemies. But I can help you. I know people there, and I can get you safe passage, fine accommodations, the best food, even some realistic-looking antiques.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Ooh. I like it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I leave.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Give him time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike didn't get to say a word to you when you left. Grog was...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog was hurt.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All right. Should I go now? I should give them some time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Maybe a little bit of breathing room, and then, yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Little steps.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I really appreciate it.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I was just telling stories in my head again.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, really? The good ones or the bad ones?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: The bad ones. They just pop in there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sorry. I know you've had a bit of a rough life.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Are you wanting me to talk about my life?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no, you don't have to. We're already weird right now, so I'm cool.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can we go to sleep now?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's eight AM.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Everyone's emotionally tired.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: So are we going to see an orb in the morning?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's midday at this point, so you guys all go to your separate rooms and take time to yourselves independently, converse amongst individually.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pike, Grog, do you want a drink?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Oh, I was just about to ask you the same thing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh. Well, I mean, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grog, I want to go find that orb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What? The orb in Ank'harel? Are we all talking over our headpieces? I think that's what we're doing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm sure Scanlan still has his. He can probably hear us talking right now.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Scanlan, can you hear me now? I take out my earpiece.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He's a dick, he can hear us. I know the range of these things.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, I take off my earpiece, too.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I kind of want to go work the blood out, Scanlan or not. I like Lionel. He's funny.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're all agreed on that, at least.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Are we supposed to be angry, or sad, or happy? I don't know what all these feelings are all at once.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can have them all at once.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Can I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes. They're not exclusive.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Percy. Where would someone like him stay in Whitestone?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where are you guys right now, by the way?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We just went to the closest pub.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is Lionel with them?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's your bodyguard.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Would you like to go with them or stay with me in my sad room?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys sit down, you get your drinks, and right as you're about to have this conversation, Lionel just moseys up to the table. The barmaid's like, "Um..."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He learned a lot about his employer today, I have no problem with him being here.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, he needs a stiff drink.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Can I get you some wine, ale, beer? What would you like?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Fruit juice, maybe?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do you have chocolate milk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We do have hot cocoa.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "I'll see what I can do." She walks away.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hot cocoa is doable. We've done hot cocoa before.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And security blankets.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's the orange blanket wrap. Grog.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Uh-huh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: What do you think?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Lionel. Real strong, are you?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm really strong. I don't know a lot of things, but I think I know that.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Aes. Does he depend on you?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: He does.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How long have you known him?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Probably about... Well, I'm not really good with years, or days or months, but probably a lot of days. Maybe a year.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: How strong do you think you are?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: The other day I tried to high-five a--

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I reach across the table and I just punch him in the face.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Roll for an attack.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I love the malice radiating this way, and the absolute lack of recognition.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It stops here. It stops at the camera line.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what's your armor class?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Go ahead and roll, for this here, I'd say a d4. Why not? Because you guys are pretty beefy. A d4 and add your strength modifier.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Nine. Ten, sorry.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He comes across and cold-cocks you in the chin. You take ten points of damage from a single punch. You feel a looseness to one of your back teeth, and the white hits you, and your vision clears for a second, and you look over and you see the beefy, gray-skinned goliath, his fist still extended as he pulls it back, staring right at you.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Whoa, that hurt!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah. This bar, there's a lot more where that came from. All you can eat, yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Show me! That was awesome!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Rage.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh no! Oh no.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Total rage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: We're not here.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, we are.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I thought you and I-- I asked...

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I thought we all said we went.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: They all left, we were behind. This is the problem when everybody's thoughts are in different heads.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Do you guys want to be in the same bar or not, that's my question right now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We don't have to be. Okay, then no. We're not there, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so you're not there. This is happening between you guys. Grog goes into a rage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we at a bar? At a table?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys are in a tavern. There's a few people, and as soon as that punch happened, a few people were like, "Ooh!" in the background, and as soon as you stand up and go into a rage, people begin to back out of the way. Tables are being pushed to the side.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm pulling gold out to pay for this.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I think it's awesome. I'm like, I want to fight back. But not-- it's play for me, now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So then, I want you guys both to roll initiative.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Grog, don't kill him! Grog, don't kill him!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What's my initiative? Oh, plus one. So what is that, a six? That's a nine. So ten?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yep.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so as you get up, you're like "All right!" And this guy-- you're used to being the biggest guy in the room. He's a little bigger than you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I, Taryon Darrington, rolled a 14.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You're not here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm with you guys.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He did come with them, yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I thought you said-- Oh, Taryon.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Drink this. And I shove a Swift Step draught in his mouth. You can run 80 feet now every turn.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so you can move pretty fast if you want to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth is just watching intently, and more importantly watching Grog, making sure he doesn't actually beat him to death. We'll stop this if it gets bad.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I take a seat on a bar stool and just start drinking.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah, we're sitting next to you.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you're preparing, Grog, this guy who's a little larger than you are, and as soon as he stands up you're like, "Oh!" And he's quicker than you thought. Grog, what are you gonna do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Are we at a table or the bar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You are, yeah.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: At a table or at the bar?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, you were at a table within the bar.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Magnificent. I flip up the table in my hands and I smash it over his head.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That doesn't belong to you. That's coming out of my coffer.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 25, okay. That hits. Go ahead and roll another d4.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So I'm quick but not that quick.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's your turn? All right, Lionel, you're up.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay! To fight?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can do anything you like.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, I definitely want to fight back because this is fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Cool. Here to help.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bonus action to rage if you want.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, but I like the-- What?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's a bonus action to rage, if you want to do that.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, I saw his rage, and I-- no, I'm going to rage, because I want to mimic. Like, hey, I can rage, too! Watch this! So do I roll that?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, no. You're now raging, so now your muscles swell, the veins bulge out, with this big grin on his mouth. When Grog's raging, Grog's angry rage. He's happy rage.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, check it out! You can see my veins go (jingling).

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So what do you want to do for your turn?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I want to go and do... So I run up to him, and I go to do the really cool thing I heard in a cool story where I twist up my fist and I go (whoosh) (pow). I've always wanted to try this, and this looks like a better time than ever to try it out.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll say plus ten for this.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's your AC? 17? Go ahead and roll a d4 and add your strength modifier, which I think is a plus five.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: And I am looking for what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: And you add five for your strength, so you got--

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So, eight.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, eight points of bludgeoning damage. You take four, Grog.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus three damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, plus three damage on top of that! So, eight, so 11. Sorry, you take five.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He takes half-damage. But you did great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're both raging. You're both taking the lesser damage of each hit.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You get two attacks, but you're raging, so you get a third attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: No, Grog has that ability. He has a different-- he's not a frenzy barbarian.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he does get two attacks.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He does get two attacks. So you get to attack again.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: This time, I run around him because I'm super quick and like using this new speed I've never experienced. And I jump on his back from around and I try to choke him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Grapple.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll an athletics check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That plus ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You go ahead and roll an athletics or acrobatics check to resist it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, shit, his is huge.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: That's not great. That's a 14.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 14. You leap up behind him and put your arm up under. His jaw's like concrete, but you still find the one soft part and jam your bulging forearm up into that space and you feel the windpipe (choke) close and clench in.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (choking sounds)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And your really, really fast feet are now dangling about two inches off the ground as you're on his back right now. That's the end of your turn. You're currently grappled, Grog, what are you going to do?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (choking sounds) I'm going to put it in reverse straight towards the wall.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll. Are you just going to stay holding on as you're doing it?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah. Because this is the first piggyback he's ever had.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's kind of fun for a second before you hit the wood. Wham! I'll say, go ahead and roll a strength saving throw to see if you can maintain the hold after the slam.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 18. Okay, I'd say that's enough for the strength of the hold. So he keeps holding on after the slam in the back. Anything else you're going to do with your turn?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: My action. I take my elbow, raise it up and drive it into his ribs.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, roll for an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, that's a 28.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so 1d4.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Now he has to roll damage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Ten.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, ten damage halved to five and you have an ability as reaction, if you remember. It's in your totem abilities that you can use as a reaction.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh! Off a Duck's Back!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Off a Duck's Back?!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: The duck is my animal totem, you guys. I can explain that later.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, as you go to slam him with your elbow, you hit, but you feel like your elbow slips off his body and doesn't quite do the damage you hoped it would. So you take two points of damage.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Sweet!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Covered in duck butter.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's the saxophone player from Lost Boys: greased up!

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: For my second attack, can I throw my head back in a headbutt?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it, roll for an attack.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Yeah, 23.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll 1d4 plus strength.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 11. So you take five points of bludgeoning damage, because you can only use that reaction once per round.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I took five points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You have to use an action to try and break free of a grapple. So you took five, yeah. So now it's back to your turn. He slammed you into the wall, he's elbowed you twice in the stomach, you've resisted some of it, you're still holding him there.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So if you wanted to, because of one of the feats you have, you could turn that into a pin if you wanted to.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: One of the feats I have?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, it's on the bottom.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Now this is turning into a wrestling match, I like that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Or you could just keep whaling on him.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I want to take him out. Not kill. He's just having fun.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's going down in the Whole Foods parking lot!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So I'm still hanging on him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, you're holding onto him by throat, he slammed you against the wall, he's elbowed you in the stomach twice.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm, again, having fun, superspeed. I'm going to, while holding onto him, crawl up his back and jump over and try to land and try to do the move where I do that and throw him.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, against one of the pillars in the bar, away from the innocent people.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an athletics check. And you have advantage on this because you're raging, so you roll twice and take the higher of the two.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, it's just the best?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll again. Yeah, roll again, best of two. Better!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, 22. Grog, I'm going to say, because you're grappled, go ahead and roll an athletics check with disadvantage.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: You got it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It should be one roll, because you're raging, you also get advantage on it, technically.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Just one roll? 24.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 24. You reach off, you leap over and you grab him and you go to pull and it's like pulling a pillar. Not budging. You can try again if you want to, or do something else.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh, because he has a second...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He has a second attack, yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I tried to jump over, so now I'm just-- Actually, I did the flip but I didn't pull him, so now I'm just hanging on the front of him. I'm still holding on, but now I'm in front of him, dangling.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's stand-spooning you.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What is this?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, so now I--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Reverse pile-drive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Go for it! Don't think, act!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, I want to start--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What would Chode do?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Kind of grinding on him. In a way, trying to use that to his advantage to make him uncomfortable.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Make an intimidation check.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That's an intimidation, okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Against Grog? Yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh! Grog's ticklish!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog, make a wisdom saving throw.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Minus two. Four.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You guys get what I'm doing.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'm going to say, for the purposes of this, it catches you so off-guard and it's so unexpected that you're stunned for the next round.

lines.name: ALL
lines.text: Oh!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you do that, you see him walk up and he starts pushing you away.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Does he let go? I can let go now.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You can let go, yeah. He's like, "Uh, uh!" You get a full other turn, what are you going to do?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Can I run back, and then do a (yelling) and then I just dive in with the biggest punch I can.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go for it. You back away, you leap--

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, everything I can put into it, all force, because I still want to get a good punch in there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, go ahead and roll for an attack. If you want it, you can make it reckless.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, he's definitely reckless.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So roll twice and take the higher on each attack.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: 15. What is that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's a 20.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, that crits!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Go ahead and roll a d4.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's also got Brutal Critical, so that adds 2d6 to that, but we'll get to that.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Technically, it would add a d4, because he's not using his sword. So, roll that twice and then add your strength.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But he's raging, so another three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: 16 points of bludgeoning damage to you, Grog. That's eight.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Eight, got it.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: How are you doing, Grog? Are you still okay? Are you bloodied yet?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He's down 22 hit points.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As your first attack, you run in. Right as soon as he looks up, you're smiling as you come at him. You watch as the beard shakes in opposition of the jaw quiver and you feel and can taste the iron welling up in the back of your tongue as you may have bitten off a small piece of the back of your tongue. As soon as you land from that punch, he looks a little stunned. You have a second attack if you want to.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm going to do my Wave Kick. That's just something he's always wanted to try, he doesn't know if it'll work. It's where he does a full-body-- and then his foot kicks him right in the groin.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Awesome. You've practiced this alone many times, this is your first chance to actually use it. So go ahead and make an attack for your Wave Kick.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Right in the crotch.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Lionel, with his nunchucks, in the family den.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Basically.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So just an attack?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Well, it's reckless, so you roll twice, take the higher.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Roll again. Better.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So go ahead and roll a d4 and add your damage.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: One.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Plus five is six?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, you only roll the d4 once.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So one plus five plus three.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, so nine. You take four points of bludgeoning damage, Grog, and you just took a swift Wave Kick to the groin, as he kind of (whack). Little snap right to the nuts, so it's not like an immediate pain, it's the tap. The dull nausea pain, and he seems to shake a little from the impact as he kinda grins and glares at you with his angry eyes. Well done. Grog?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (deadpan) Grog, stop, no, don't kill him.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: (gasping)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He just walked away.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's over?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That was fun, you guys. That was fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Pike, do you want to go deal with that?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I was just having fun. Is he all right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He'll be fine.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I've never seen Grog walk away from a fight. He's not fine. What are you talking about?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't say he's fine, I said he will be fine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm pretty sure this makes you a member of Vox Machina now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's not get ahead of ourselves.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that's what happened to me, they attacked me and then I was in.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There was chocolate milk on the way.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You see the woman in the back is carrying this mug and is like, "Right."

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He'll need a straw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Here's your chocolate milk."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Anybody else want to fight?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: (cheering)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You get the chocolate milk to your mouth, before (impact sound) knocks it right out of your hand.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were you standing on the table when this happened? I'm so excited.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And you watch, the fist comes across, and the gnome that is in an arc of movement lands on her feet. You look down and you can see the white-haired, fully armored gnome there with her big gauntlets is now there below you, kind of grinning and growling.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That was good chocolate milk!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We'll have another.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm bummed about the chocolate. You guys have any more chocolate milk?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Yeah."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another round.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "Okay." She wanders off.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chocolate's expensive, here.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That was awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: She can take it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm pretty awesome. I finish my ale, flick a money on the bar, and leave. Oh shit, I don't have any money, because I gave it all away. Tary, Tary?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm covering, I'm covering.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Thank you, because I don't have much.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: She goes, "And the table?"

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Sorry. There's a pile that's been growing on the table of gold for the furniture.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "All right, thank you." Brings you another round of chocolate milk.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Is anybody going to hit me before I drink this?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, I think that's done now.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm not, like, I'm not checking. It's fine if you do. Okay.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just drink it first.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think it's chocolate milk time.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Mmm.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is really nice.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I just want to say, you guys, this is the most fun I've had in a long time. Aes, or you guys call him Scanlan?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aes is fine, Aes is fine.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: He's all I've known for the past year, you know? He took me in when, you know, things weren't going too well for me. And it's been great. He had a really cool speech about family, I've never heard him talk like that. It was kind of weird, because he's always been this really tough guy, but I don't know if you guys realize that I just found out he lied to me for a year.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, we know. It's why we took you to a bar. He's lied to us, too.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, I know that he lied to you, and I just found out that he lied to me, but it's okay.

lines.name: MARISHA, TALIESIN
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Because I realise that he was always there, and even though I worked for him, and, you know, he told me what to do, and would bark orders, he always had my back, and he was the only one who took care of me. So I think you guys should, like, be nice to him. Or--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's the trouble, he does always have your back, until he doesn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The idiot has a point.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, let's not call names.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What's an idiot?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Oh hey, Tary.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You're still here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes. I am.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I get confused because of the cup.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I know.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Can I kick you in the nuts?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Uh, please don't. I'm very dainty.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Extremely dainty.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You guys seem like you all enjoy that kind of stuff, it's awesome.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, you've met the couple that do.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Only Scanlan can make Vox Machina speechless. It's happened a few times tonight. Did you notice that?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Hadn't.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm really angry.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do we do?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I want to go see that bloody orb.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, Chode?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Mm?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Lionel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Sorry.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're so good about this normally.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's all right. At least you guys are remembering one of my names. I had to come up with a couple-- I used to have ten, just to make it easier for people to even call me a name.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have quite a few names myself.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Chard? Where did you come from before you met Scanlan?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, I lived in the desert. I woke up, I don't remember much when I was a baby. I'm sure you guys all remember when you were babies, but--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. Usually not.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I always thought that's how it was done.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Nope. Nobody does. So far, so good.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Don't break him, please.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: But the only thing I knew, I was orphaned, I didn't-- I never know my parents, 'cause I woke up in a basket, in a small creek, and the only thing that was there were ducks.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, wait--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No, no, no, don't say wait! Go on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just let him tell his story.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: And ever since then, ducks have been my spirit animal, and I feel like they bring me strength, and bring me-- make me smarter and they give me courage. So I grew up in the desert. It was a rough time, but--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Were these desert ducks?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, how'd you know they were ducks? Normally ducks don't live in the desert.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: These must have been very interesting ducks.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're not there.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: What's a vult--

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Nothing-- said a voice that wasn't there. Carry on.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: They were ducks.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Some people called it an oasis or something.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: An oasis, yes.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Now, you know, I never saw ducks again there, so, I don't know, but I'm confident they were real.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Migratory, perhaps.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The ducks blessed you. And your birth and your survival.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, I just, uh--

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He doesn't know what a vulture is! (chuckles)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I realised I was strong, and I could do really, you know, awesome things with my body, so I did-- that kind of helped me when growing up, and then finally I came to the city of--

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: (whispers) Ank'harel.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Ank'harel.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ank'harel is the city, okay.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: That's fair. I've earned that.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: He was kind, and he brought me into his family.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Family.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: A lot of talk of family, today.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: He talked a lot of family to you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And ducks.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: And ducks. Did he talk much more about his family to you?
