lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, I didn't-- I didn't know he had a daughter. I mean, there was this really, like, killer babe in our group, I didn't-- where is he? Where's Aes, you guys?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Aes ain't here right now.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Well, don't tell him, but... I always had a thing for her, but now that I know it's his daughter, yeesh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're not the first.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, that's good to know. So. But no, I didn't know much about, you know, he didn't tell me much, I didn't ask a lot of questions. Nobody's ever asked me questions. You guys are great.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're a fascinating creature, sir. Good man.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We like you, Lionel. Hey, Lion. C'mere, c'mere.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Parchment-boulder-shears! I'm going to teach you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's like rock-paper-scissors.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Okay, ready, ready, ready? Boulder, parchment, or shears. Okay. Ready? On three.

lines.name: JON, MARISHA
lines.text: One, two, three.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: (laughter)

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Never mind, not disappointed.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As this transpires, we come over to you two, having a drink. So you guys find a separate pub.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I figured we just sat under the Sun Tree.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, I've got a flask.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: It's midafternoon.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This is complicated. Real complicated.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah. I was so happy to see him.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Me, too. Grog and Pike were not happy to see him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No. We've got to find a way to get them talking again.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah. I think they will, but you're right, it will take some massaging. You know, I wasn't lying, I knew we would see him again.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know. Couldn't let him know that, though.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: This has been nice. It's always nice.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Mm-hm?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I'm real happy in my setup these days, but--

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: With Keyleth?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: That was the implication, yeah. But I miss you busting my balls on the regular.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I know, right? Yeah. I miss it, too.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think-- we were about to head back, but we've got to get this sorted out first.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: What do you reckon's next? We're going to Marquet, then?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, probably Ank'harel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You all right?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, I'm fine.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: You don't seem fine.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, I'm great. You know, it's interesting, Scanlan being back. Makes me realize that, you know, he's not the only one who keeps secrets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: And you can't blame someone for keeping things to themselves, so I'm not mad at him anymore for the things that he keeps to himself, because everybody's got their something, you know?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are you getting at something?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm fine with it. With the secrets.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I feel like I'm missing something.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, nothing at all.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Well, I'm not mad at him. I hope Pike and Grog can come around.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they will. He's quite charming. I think everyone will come around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I hope so. I feel like, you know.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: The Sun Tree? Pelor? Raven Queen?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Hey! (laughter)

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I wonder if it's time.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Time for what?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Nothing, I'm drunk, never mind. Did you see this ring I picked up?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: (laughs) Oh, did you buy that off a little caravan?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, while you guys were fucking about with him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That's great!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It's very handsome.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's really nice. It's really nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah. Well. I love you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I love you. Glad we're all here. I'm glad we're all here!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All of us. All of us. Do you want to go find the rest?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Let's go find the rest.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, all right.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Right as Vax walks in-- Fuck!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You guys begin walking back to the pub. You've been hearing the commotion in the distance. You assume that's it. You watch as Grog walks by in a huff.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Grog?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Big man?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: What?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you all right?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Cat. C-A-T. And I leave.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You're so smart! Do we see Pike come out after him?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're still in the tavern?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I left after him.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You did. So then you watch Pike come out in a huff a little after him.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Hey!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What happened in there?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm going to go take a nap, I'm very tired.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Insight check.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, we don't really need to roll an insight check to see this one's not doing so well.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: It was really low.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm great! I'm all right. Just going to sleep it off, I think.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Yeah, too much to drink, probably.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah, I'm feeling very drunk, so I'm going to go to bed.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Pickled Pickle.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'm a pickled Pickle, yeah. But I'll see you guys tomorrow.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Everything will be better in the morning.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sleep is the best medicine.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are a cleric.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Pike wanders off. You guys make your way to the tavern where the commotion's there. You walk in just as you see Keyleth and Lionel in the process and about to play an intense game of Boulder-Parchment-Shears before Lionel just decks Keyleth across the face.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, guys! We're playing Boulder-Parchment-Shears! And then I Alter Self my fist into a rock elemental fist, a Keyteor fist, and I go, see, look! Boulder! And I backhand Lionel.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's going to be a d4 plus your...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: d4, you already hit. Just the d4.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I'll say you hit because she wasn't expecting it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Is he still raging?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: He's still raging at this point. Why not?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'm still raging. How long does that last?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Actually, no, you'd have to be raging again because you did do your whole duck speech.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Six.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you could rage and then attack.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So I could rage-- yeah, okay, so, that was just-- yeah, that was all right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take six damage. Now, Keyleth, go ahead and make an attack roll. With your earth elemental, I believe it's a plus what, to hit?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just with my fist? Sure, you want me to use Earth elemental? I mean, yeah, yeah, totes.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Just the attack bonus.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Add your strength modifier to one. So what's your strength modifier?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Just to one? Plus five. So, six, six damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So, six damage, you take, whack! To the chin. Her fist is a rock.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: And do I take half that or no?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: If you started raging before that, then yes, you would.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: But you weren't raging yet.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: But you can use your reaction to-- Off a Duck's Back.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, no, I don't want to.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take the five damage right to the jaw. Whack! So now you got both sides of the jaw ringing a little bit in pain.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: This is the best game of Boulder-Parchment-Shears!

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Who else wants to-- Is it just a two-player game?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am walking away with my chocolate milk and walking over to you guys. They're bonding.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: And as he's going, I sneak a bullet from him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can try. You can certainly try.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, go ahead and roll for that. Roll your sleight of hand. And Percival, I want you to go ahead and roll a perception check.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Perception is 19.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So I have to get what?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're rolling with sleight of hand, so add sleight of hand to whatever you roll.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He beat it.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You pocket a little shot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, shit, he beat my passive perception, too!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah. Nobody sees it. Nobody sees it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well done.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hey, guys, does anyone have any shears?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, and no.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Shears?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I have them. You can't have them.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So Percival walks past and approaches them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: They're bonding. He's a bit adorable.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Seems nice.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's likable.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I am angry, frustrated, and violent, and so I'm going to try something new and drink chocolate milk, and listen to you and do whatever it is you think is best at this point. I don't know what to do. What do we do? What do I do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I don't know what to do either, dear. I think it's a matter of... Forgive.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well, I'm not there yet, but I know I'm feeling emotional, and I know that's when I need to shut up and listen to you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just happy he's back.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm worried about Grog.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm very worried about him and Pike.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm very worried about Pike. I don't know what to do.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Are they fist-fighting in the background?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: (sizzle)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Your armor suddenly begins to turn bright orange and burn your skin. (sizzle)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh! Okay, okay, that hurts, that hurts.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: How much damage does that do, Marisha?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: 2d8 damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, that's going to hurt. And you get to re-roll that one, don't you?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Ten damage.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Fuck him up, babe!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (sizzle) It sears into you, and you're like, "Ooh, it burns! That's new! That's new! "That's new pain!"

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I try to do a little bit of the Off a Duck's Back.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so you go ahead and you take five damage. You shrink into your armor. You try and minimize your torso.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: He's turtling.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: All right, one second. I'm going to gently walk up behind them while this is happening and I'm going to Vulcan neck pinch him with the Diplomacy.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay, go ahead and roll for an attack.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That's... Where is that? There it is.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: This is going to take a saving throw?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: 21 to hit.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I have danger sense, so does that...?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Yeah, so what's the save on that?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It just says I have advantage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: On dexterity saving throws.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: On dexterity saving throws. Is that a dexterity?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What's it say on Diplomacy?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's a... I have to pull out the thing, I didn't pull this together as much as I thought I should've. It's a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right, so go ahead and roll a constitution saving throw.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Which is a d20. I'm going to roll the damage really quickly. Oh wow, this is a lot of damage. I apologize. 17 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So you take 17 points of lightning damage.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Constitution saving throw now.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He saves. That's a natural 20. Oh well, that didn't work.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You feel this burst of electrical energy.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was supposed to knock you out, and now it didn't.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Anybody else want to? No? Okay, I'm going.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And Lionel just leaves.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This thing never works properly. I really have to work on that.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: That was a weak hit, by the way, if you were trying to hit me. See you. Oh, wait, hold on. Are you going to drink this chocolate milk?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You can take it. You've earned it.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'll take it.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just leaves the bar with the glass.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Another gold coin goes on the table.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I mean, would you stop it?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So the four of you now sit there in the bar.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Five of us, Tary is there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Tary is there, that's right.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: He really would be good for the brigade.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I kind of like him.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, yeah.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's the sort of positive energy I think your family's going to need around.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Absolutely. I like him a lot.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Are you sure you can't stay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm staying for a little while. I have to find Doty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I understand.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I have to find Doty and get some stuff, and then I've got to be on my way.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: By the way, what you said back there, with your family, about me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was very flattering.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, I know you're taken, and, you know.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Doesn't mean I can't be flattered. I'm quite flattered. That was very flattering.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I meant it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: If things were very different.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I get it. I get it. You're sort of making it worse.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You're quite a catch. You're quite a catch.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Can you stop flirting with each other?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to gather up our things and prop up the table again and leave-- How much gold would be appropriate for the damage and then some?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The table isn't that expensive, to be honest. Between the drinks you guys had, a solid seven or eight gold will handle it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'm going to leave ten gold and be like, I'm so sorry, but try never not to make it worth your while and not be too horrible.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's nice to know that the de Rolos are as lively as the rest of the people who live here."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Thank you for running this establishment. Have a good day.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "You, too, my lord. My lady."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's go find the kids and see if we can make them feel better.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they were going to bed, but we can try.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Keyleth throws her arm around Vax and catches him up the whole way we walk. I really think you would really like Chode. He's super nice, and he likes drinking chocolate milk...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I do, I like him already. He's instantly likable.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We got to talk a lot. We talked about his background...

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was trying to...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, gosh. Where were you?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I was trying to pitch him to Tary, but I really like him. I want him to stay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, this is all good. I love how you've all fallen in love with Chod over here. It took you guys a full two weeks to even stomach me for a day, but that's all right. It's fine.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We not asking him to join, while we were thinking about having you join.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, he's great, though. We're instant love with him.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: He's not Vox Machina material, though.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Are you Taryon right now?

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Hey, you know, I feel like we were about to make our exit, but it's a little more complicated now, right?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Might need to stay on a day or two.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Are we doing this thing?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, we're definitely doing this. We're going to Ank'harel.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: I think we got to.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The ziggurat's kind of a big deal, right? I feel like that's warranted for extra Ashari leave time, for diplomatic duty. Right?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You said duty.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I did say duty.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I know. I knew you would know. Never change.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I'll let Dad know he's going to have to watch the tribe for a few more weeks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I'll let Cass know.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: But one of these days I will have to be getting back. Very soon.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Let's see how they feel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Pike? Grog? Did you put your earrings back on?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You hear nothing.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I think they're really depressed, dear.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I think they're angry and sad.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What? Percy?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We can all hear you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Oh, is this a party line?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, definitely. Yeah.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: I'm just letting you know their earrings are off. They can't hear us.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Or they're not talking.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What should I do?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Say you're sorry.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: But they can't hear me.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, go fucking find them.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Something like this is better done in person, as opposed to over a communication device.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I shouldn't text my apology?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Nope, you should not.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Boy, there's a life lesson. D&D continued.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Don't use the Message spell to drop heavy shit!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Eye contact, motherfuckers. Eye contact.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Right then I walk into wherever he is, right?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Right, you go back to the tavern.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: And I walk in. Hey. Boss. I got you the bullets.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You did?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You are my best man!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: It's okay. Carry on.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: So, anyways. I'm going to go to bed now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's nighttime, right?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, no, it is. But did I buy him a room, or is he just sort of...?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: No, you don't have to buy me a room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You bought out the inn.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I'll just go sleep in the corner either way.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. Yeah. If anyone tries to kill me, kill them.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, yeah, I got it. I have danger sense.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, you do?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: And the ducks will tell me if there's anything wrong.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The ducks. Yes, I know this about you.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I actually have Commune with Ducks.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Staring at it right now.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: You know what, I'm going to use it right now.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Do we have ducks near us?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are ducks in Whitestone!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: In Whitestone, there's a lot more ducks in this area than there are in Marquet.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: There are ducks. We have ponds in the local park. There's a small pond in the cemetery.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I forget I can do that wherever I go, and I never get the chance.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What are you going to ask them?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: They can tell me up to three facts about the land.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes, what do the ducks of Whitestone say?

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: What do the ducks say?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: (quacking)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: As you take a moment and you kneel, and you close your eyes, you envision the connection you had as a child to the ducks along the pond of the oasis, and as you open your eyes again, you see there, waddling in through the doorway of the inn, as the sun in the afternoon is going down to dusk, this one duck (quacking).

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Hey, Brownie! What do you have to say about this place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: What do you want to ask it?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Oh, I have to ask.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: All I hear is quacking, right? He's just quacking at the duck?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You're just hearing quacking back and forth.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do we get bad weather here? Do you get bad storms here?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "It's pretty cloudy. Great."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay, so don't leave the hut without an umbrella, okay?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay, thank you.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: And then, do we have to worry about-- Are there any pyramids? Have you seen any pyramids around the place?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The duck's head turns the other way, and it says to you through quacks, "Actually, there's one below the city."

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How do the ducks know that?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: They wander everywhere.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: How did they get down there?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: The essence of nature.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The same reason why pigeons are in Costco, okay?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: He said there's another pyramid under the city.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: The duck knew that?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That is crazy.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Should we go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, no, no.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Okay... Is there anything you need to know, master?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: About this area. It's pretty limited.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Have Vox Machina been happy?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Ducks, do you know if that group over there, have they been happy? Have they been happy?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: "They didn't look happy when they left the tavern."

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I think we all knew that you kind of wasted that last one. It's okay, we did it. See you, Brownie! That was awesome!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (flapping wings)

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Can we go to another city sometime soon so I can do that again?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. You need to use that skill more often. You know what the problem is, we don't have as many ducks in Ank'harel.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: It's not that useful.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You've been great this whole trip.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Thank you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll tell you what. I'm going to buy some ducks, and just keep them back in Ank'harel for you. They can be your little birds.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I go to hug him, but then I forget that he's... Is he still enchanted?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, I'm a little guy.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: I squeeze him hard. A little too hard, probably.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ow, ow.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: All right, I'm going to go sleep in the corner.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Please do.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Sleeps in the corner. All right. Scanlan, are you doing anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I was told to come apologize and find them.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I was told...

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go seek my friends out there in the world.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. Where do you go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Where am I going? Hello? It's me, Scanlan Shorthalt.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Where do you want to go?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I don't know, where is everybody?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well. Pike and Grog went back to their rooms.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Should I go knock on their doors?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: It's up to you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay. I'll go find-- Do I know where they're staying?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You do. You've been to Whitestone Castle, you know where the rooms are in the castle, it's just been a while.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll go knock on Grog's door.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Do you need me for anything?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No, you sleep it off.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Are you sure?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, you've had too much chocolate milk.

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Yeah, I am feeling a little bloated down there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: You make your way to the castle. You're let in, because the guards still recognize you as a member of Vox Machina. Which room do you go to first?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Grog.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog. Are you in your room?

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Mm-hm.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (knocking)

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Pike?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It's me! Scan-man! Can I come in? I Dimension Door into the room.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Scanlan (poof) appears in the center of your chambers.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: You okay? You didn't come to the door. Big fella.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: I leave.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I take a shit on his bed -- no, I'm kidding.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Grog leaves the chamber and exits.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll walk over to Pike's room, then.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. Pike, are you in your room?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (knocking)

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Hello? It's me, Scan-man.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: What do you want?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to talk and say hello.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, but we already said hello.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Just to apologize again.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I'll open the door. Yes?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'm glad it didn't come to that, but it's an honor to know that you would have even considered it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I slap him across the face.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Sure, sure.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: (echoing slap)

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Do you know... Do you remember what you said, before you left? I mean, obviously you said lots of things. But there was one thing in particular that's always bothered me.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: What?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: You said that you were kept alive by some weird fucking magic. And that's what I do. And I brought you back so you could be with your daughter. So fuck you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Well, that was a cheap shot.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Sure. And you know what, I apologize for putting you in my clothes, but the Scanlan that we know would've thought that was funny. I'm sorry I didn't know your mother, but I imagine you don't know my mother's name.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I was not a good friend, and I was not a good teammate. And I'll have to live with that. But I can tell you this. I like who I am now, and I didn't then. So maybe, someday, we'll meet, and you'll get to know the new guy, but if it's not meant to happen right now, that's okay, and I understand. And I will go back to what I was doing before.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: So you like who you are better without us?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: No. No, that's not what I meant. I meant, I like who I am now that I know my daughter, and I know that no matter what, I have someone out there who's rooting for me. And no matter what happens, I've got that. And I... Yeah. That's it. I don't like what I've been doing the last year in terms of, you know. I've been breaking the law a bit, which I know you don't love.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: I don't care what you do.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: So I can't make everybody happy anymore, and I think that was my problem before. I was trying to make everyone happy, and that's not my goal anymore. I'm sorry if I hurt you. I'm sorry how I treated you when we first met, how I ogled you and flirted with you relentlessly. That was disrespectful. But what I'm most sorry for is that you met me then, and not now. And that's all I can say.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Well. Perhaps we'll meet again in different circumstances.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Okay.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Good night.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll leave.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. You make your way back.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: And I'll just phone Vex real quick and say, hey, didn't work. I'm going to go back to Ank'harel now.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No, no, no, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, it's not working, it's not great, so, nope.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, it takes time. Things take time.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure it does.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Scanlan, where are you?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm outside Pike's room, weirdly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Shit. Stay there.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I mean, I think she can hear me talking through the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: She can't, I don't think she's wearing the earring. Unless she put it back in.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm sure she can hear me through the door.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh, seriously? Right there?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. Yeah. Pike, can you hear me?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yes, I can hear you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah, she can totally hear everything.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: This is an open channel. We can all hear.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Hi, Scanlan.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, hi! Hi, Keyleth.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: Maybe you should just sleep on it before leaving town, buddy.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Well, no, we're coming with you. You're not just leaving us again.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Again!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: You just got here.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: And some of us are happy to see you.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We're going to go see the pyramid.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yeah, you can go to Ank'harel, but we'll be right behind you, I guess. We know who you are now, Aes... Agus...

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Tary, are you in for one more adventure before heading home?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: That would be a sweet close to it. I met you in Ank'harel, didn't I?

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Yes.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm down.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Excellent.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Because I'm trying to sleep, you motherfuckers.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Take your earring off, put it on silent if you ever want to fall asleep.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: The clasp is rusted from when we were in the water plane, I can't take it off.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: We take ours off, I'm taking mine off now. Good night.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Okay, okay, shut up everyone.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: It's stuck there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: All right. You all eventually find yourselves to rest for the evening. Scanlan, you make your way back?

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'm going to leave the little rock thing that Grog gave me right outside his door, and I'll get Lionel up at first light, and I guess we'll set off for Ank'harel.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: We'll see him there.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Okay. That's a two-week journey for you.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I got no other way to get there.

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: You could come with us.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: It was not offered.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes, you were, we didn't tell you to go! Scanlan, we said don't go!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Didn't you just say I will see you there?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: No! Fucking Keyleth said that!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: I said if you run away we'll still find you.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: We'll still be right behind you.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: We're not telling you to fucking go.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Wait, so you want to travel with me?

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yes!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Oh, okay, well, then I'll stick around.

lines.name: LIAM
lines.text: All over the earring.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: You know, I miss this drama. This is the drama I missed. This is great.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: So we'll say at the next morning light, as you all come to consciousness, you find there, spry and waiting in the center of town, one Scanlan Shorthalt and one Lionel Gayheart, ready to join you on a trip back to Ank'harel. And that's where we'll pick up next week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: Did you want to say something?

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: No.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Is there something you wanted to do? Something you wanted to button it on? Let's do it now. As you guys are gathering in the center of the city, on your way to the Sun Tree, they stand there in the light. You guys have your equipment on you, you're prepared for whatever may come on the other side of the world in the deserts of Marquet, wherever this mountain may be.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Oh, you're still here.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Yeah. You need me to find this thing, so I'll lead you to it.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: They're called shorties. They're after you. So hopefully you like them.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Much like you, they're a bit disappointing.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Yeah.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: I'll try-- Well, does it have any...

lines.name: JON
lines.text: Cookies! (nom)

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: And that's where we'll end the episode this week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Well fucking done, man! Well fucking done!

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Holy crap!

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Thank you so much for playing with us this week! That was so much fun!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Yay Chode!

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Chod?

lines.name: JON
lines.text: She still can't get it right.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Congratulations to you. Denoba will contact you if they haven't already to get your information.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: What was under the blanket the whole time?

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: We'll have to wait 'til next week.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That or cake.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Possibly.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my gosh.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Actually, I was about to say, because he's not seen a proper battlemap, so maybe...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Dude, thank you so much for coming and playing with us. Seriously.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: That was so much fun.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: That was amazing!

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Lionel!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Prepare for so much duck art. There's just going to be... It's going to be like a 50's study. It's going to be so much.

lines.name: SAM
lines.text: Ducks everywhere.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: I love it.

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: Mallard art.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Oh my God, next week's our 100th episode! How fucking weird is it that we got the T-shirts released...

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: Oh, dude. The minute that you showed that the T-shirts had shown up to everyone in the store tonight, me and Sam were like...

lines.name: MARISHA
lines.text: Like, if people didn't think we had a writer's room before, they definitely are now! This feels like a marketing campaign!

lines.name: TALIESIN
lines.text: I didn't know about the shirts until we showed up. That's just been in process.

lines.name: LAURA
lines.text: Yeah, we've just been working on this shirt for a while. And it came out this week.

lines.name: TRAVIS
lines.text: We didn't plan that in any way.

lines.name: ASHLEY
lines.text: Serendipitous.

lines.name: MATT
lines.text: That's for you, that's for you. Have a wonderful night, guys. Rest well. And is it Thursday yet? Good night! [music]
